story:
Get the Press Kit

 

 

An incredible ultra-wide 162 degree FOV lens to witness the vast blue world. Custom-engineered aspherical lens arranged in 7 groups ensure that the FIFISH P3 captures clear, accurate and true-color images every time. The lens is with the best design currently available on the market.

The 1-inch SONY CMOS sensor is almost four times the size of typical underwater camera sensors to capture more details for high performance in insufficient light environments.

 

FIFISH P3’s triple thruster design allows smooth and accurate navigation in six directions. Built-in posture sensor and algorithm ensures steady movements in any direction.  

FIFISH P3 can perform 1.5m/s maximum speed in still water. With finely tuned, ultra-sensitive control, professionals will feel right at home with FIFISH P3 remote controller and new users will quickly master it too. The mount  is compatible with smartphone and 7.9’ tablet.

 

The industrial design of FIFISH P3 is precise from inside out. Our award winning team consists of leading industrial engineers, hydrodynamics experts, hardware engineers and supply chain experts. It is honored with two CES Innovation Awards and other industrial merits.

 

 
 
 

Ergonomic design makes the FIFISH P3 dedicated controller comfortable to hold and maneuver with ultra-sensitive controls. 

 

FIFISH P3’s remote controller uses a 2.4GHz frequency to connect with viewing devices. It can easily achieve 1080P transmission and makes it possible to watch epic moments unfold in real-time.

 

FIFISH P3 comes with a dedicated mobile app, which allows users to easily control and monitor depth, location, battery and storage. Feature rich with iOS and Android apps, FIFISH P3 is perfect for ocean exploration and sharing moments with friends.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

With constant technological developments, we’ve seen surprising progress and breakthrough upon land and space exploration.

However, when it comes to the ocean, up till now, only a small portion has been seen or explored. In spite of that, we see marine life suffering from pollution, coral disappearing, polar bears, penguins and other wildlife being threatened by environmental change. The ocean is in a critical era---an era with increasing request for change.

Due to the unique challenges of the Marine environment, most tools for ocean exploration are limited to military and industrial applications. There is a lack of consumer-friendly products for ocean exploration and those that exist has inadequate performance. We sincerely hope to offer a quality option for underwater photographers, researchers and consumers. And even more, with our mutual efforts, we hope to bring a huge boost to the development of Marine technology. This is a hard and challenging task but with significant value.

We look forward to receiving your support, to help optimize our product, to motivate the development of Marine technology, and finally to drive positive change for the ocean world!

 

Bring FIFISH P3 Home

200m Tether | Early Bird

Help to spread the word

 

How long does the battery last between charges? 

 The FIFISH P3 battery lasts for 2 hours during normal operation.

How long does it take to fully charge the battery?

FIFISH P3 requires 3.5 hours from full discharge to full charge. 

What's the standard length of the remote control cable?

The standard length of remote control cable is 70 meters, however, user can upgrade to 120 meters.

What are the dimensions and weight?

Dimensions are 49.2cm*33.7cm*18.3cm and weight is 6kg.

How deep can the FIFISH P3 operate?

FIFISH P3 can work from the surface to a depth of 100m underwater.

How do I turn FIFISH P3 On and Off?

When you insert the ROV cable plug into the ROV connector, the device turns on automatically.  When you remove the plug, the FIFISH P3 is turned off.

How is the FIFISH P3 initially set up?

First, connect the ROV cable with the ROV controller. Then power On the controller and open the FIFISH APP. 

What is the remote control range for the FIFISH P3?

The remote control range is up to 200m. 

What is the resolution of the camera module?

The resolution of the camera module is 4K (30fps) HD video.

What formats are the video and photos?

The video format is MP4 and the photo format is JPG. 

Does FIFISH P3 come with a warranty? How long is the warranty?

We provide 6~12 month warranty for FIFISH P3, the warranty period is different for different components and accessories.  We also ensure that every unit is free from manufacturing defects and handled with the utmost care during shipment. Please check our warranty policy on our website: www.qysea.com. 

Do I have to pay VAT/GST?

Yes.Taxes vary for different countries, please check with your local tax authority for details. Customers are responsible for assuring the product can be lawfully imported to the destination country. The recipient is the importer of record and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. Orders shipped may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees levied by the destination country. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties and fees, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient; FIFISH has no control over these charges.

What is the refund policy?

Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis.  Our refund policy is based on Indiegogo policy prior to shipping. We will not be able to refund orders once the product has shipped. 

 How much is the shipping fee?

We provide worldwide free shipping, however, recipient is responsible for VAT/GST and any import taxes that may apply. 

When do you start shipping?

We begin shipping by the end of May 2018. Actual ship dates will vary depending on your country, your location, and when you placed your order. We will keep you up to date on every step of the process.

How confident are you that you can deliver on time?

Because of our close relationships with our manufacturing partners and the extensive testing that has already been performed, we are confident in our ability to meet the timeline. Although unforeseen obstacles can arise during any manufacturing process, we intend to run everything efficiently, transparently, and on-time to over-deliver on the expectations of our backers.

Why order now?

We are offering a discount on all pre-orders of FIFISH P3 in return for your support. Our team has spent countless hours on research and development, and are committed to bringing you the best underwater experience. We have encountered many difficulties in our journey, but we never give up, and after nearly 2 years of extensive market and product research we are one step away from manufacturing.

How can I change my shipping address?

If you need to change address, please send your updated shipping information to our customer service team (service@qysea.com）
story_txt:
Get the Press Kit  An incredible ultra-wide 162 degree FOV lens to witness the vast blue world. Custom-engineered aspherical lens arranged in 7 groups ensure that the FIFISH P3 captures clear, accurate and true-color images every time. The lens is with the best design currently available on the market.The 1-inch SONY CMOS sensor is almost four times the size of typical underwater camera sensors to capture more details for high performance in insufficient light environments. FIFISH P3’s triple thruster design allows smooth and accurate navigation in six directions. Built-in posture sensor and algorithm ensures steady movements in any direction.  
FIFISH P3 can perform 1.5m/s maximum speed in still water. With finely tuned, ultra-sensitive control, professionals will feel right at home with FIFISH P3 remote controller and new users will quickly master it too. The mount  is compatible with smartphone and 7.9’ tablet.

 
The industrial design of FIFISH P3 is precise from inside out. Our award winning team consists of leading industrial engineers, hydrodynamics experts, hardware engineers and supply chain experts. It is honored with two CES Innovation Awards and other industrial merits. 

 




 
 

Ergonomic design makes the FIFISH P3 dedicated controller comfortable to hold and maneuver with ultra-sensitive controls.  FIFISH P3’s remote controller uses a 2.4GHz frequency to connect with viewing devices. It can easily achieve 1080P transmission and makes it possible to watch epic moments unfold in real-time. FIFISH P3 comes with a dedicated mobile app, which allows users to easily control and monitor depth, location, battery and storage. Feature rich with iOS and Android apps, FIFISH P3 is perfect for ocean exploration and sharing moments with friends.        With constant technological developments, we’ve seen surprising progress and breakthrough upon land and space exploration.However, when it comes to the ocean, up till now, only a small portion has been seen or explored. In spite of that, we see marine life suffering from pollution, coral disappearing, polar bears, penguins and other wildlife being threatened by environmental change. The ocean is in a critical era---an era with increasing request for change.Due to the unique challenges of the Marine environment, most tools for ocean exploration are limited to military and industrial applications. There is a lack of consumer-friendly products for ocean exploration and those that exist has inadequate performance. We sincerely hope to offer a quality option for underwater photographers, researchers and consumers. And even more, with our mutual efforts, we hope to bring a huge boost to the development of Marine technology. This is a hard and challenging task but with significant value.We look forward to receiving your support, to help optimize our product, to motivate the development of Marine technology, and finally to drive positive change for the ocean world! Bring FIFISH P3 Home200m Tether | Early BirdHelp to spread the word How long does the battery last between charges?  The FIFISH P3 battery lasts for 2 hours during normal operation.How long does it take to fully charge the battery?FIFISH P3 requires 3.5 hours from full discharge to full charge. What's the standard length of the remote control cable?The standard length of remote control cable is 70 meters, however, user can upgrade to 120 meters.What are the dimensions and weight?Dimensions are 49.2cm*33.7cm*18.3cm and weight is 6kg.How deep can the FIFISH P3 operate?FIFISH P3 can work from the surface to a depth of 100m underwater.How do I turn FIFISH P3 On and Off?When you insert the ROV cable plug into the ROV connector, the device turns on automatically.  When you remove the plug, the FIFISH P3 is turned off.How is the FIFISH P3 initially set up?First, connect the ROV cable with the ROV controller. Then power On the controller and open the FIFISH APP. What is the remote control range for the FIFISH P3?The remote control range is up to 200m. What is the resolution of the camera module?The resolution of the camera module is 4K (30fps) HD video.What formats are the video and photos?The video format is MP4 and the photo format is JPG. Does FIFISH P3 come with a warranty? How long is the warranty?We provide 6~12 month warranty for FIFISH P3, the warranty period is different for different components and accessories.  We also ensure that every unit is free from manufacturing defects and handled with the utmost care during shipment. story:
​

BUYING & SHIPPING

CAMERA SETUP

HOW IT WORKS, FEATURES, APPS

SD CARD, NOTIFICATIONS, RECORDINGS

TECHNICAL DETAILS AND SECURITY

INTEGRATIONS, GEOFENCING

OTHER QUESTIONS


-----------------------------------------------------

 

BUYING & SHIPPING

Q. When will I get my Oco2 camera(s)?

A. [UPDATED] After finishing the campaign, we will start mass production in late September, and the first cameras will be shipped in October 2016. The shipment can take from 10 to 30 days (depending on the destination).

Q. Do you ship to the EU / Russia / Australia?

A. Yes, we ship worldwide.

Q. How will shipping be handled internationally?

A. US shipping is free. The shipping cost to EU, Canada, Russia and the rest of the world is $50 per order. The shipment does not include extra fees from customs or additional costs associated with your country. Also, there is no guarantee that this will work in your country (e.g. unknown power & connectivity issues). If it turns out that shipment to your country proves impossible, we will reimburse your order. 

Q. When will the product be on the market after the campaign is over?

A. Once we have shipped cameras to all of our backers, we will release the product to the public.

Q. How many Oco2 cameras should I get for my home?

A. The super-wide 140-degree view angle allows you to use only one Oco2 camera in a room to view it entirely, so you can consider buying 2 or 3 cameras for your home. The 2-pack and 3-pack have the biggest discounts.

Q. Can I have additional cameras in different locations (i.e. home and office) and access them all from my app?

A. Sure, with the free plan you can have up to 15 Oco2 cameras on one account, and these cameras can be at different locations. With any extended plan, you have no limitation on the number of cameras that can be used in one account. You can move them any time and add as many cameras as you want. Oco2 makes it easy for homeowners and businesses to scale their security system instantly.

 

 

CAMERA SETUP

Q. How easy is it to set-up the Oco2 camera?

A. It usually takes 1–2 minutes to set up the Oco2 camera and no technical skills are required. Enter your Wi-Fi password into the app. You’ll be provided with a QR code, which you then show to your Oco2 camera. That’s it! Put the camera on any flat surface, adjust the camera tilt angle on magnetic stand, and enjoy

Q. Can I mount Oco2 camera on a wall or ceiling?

A. Yes, you can use the enclosed magnet stand as a wall mount. Use the enclosed screws and dowels or double-sided tape to mount the magnet stand to the wall or ceiling. Then just attach the camera to the magnet stand and adjust the tilt angle.

Q. Screw thread for tripod? What the…?

A. Sometimes you don’t have a shelf or a wall in the place you’d like to mount your camera. Oco2 has a standard 1/4'' screw thread that you can usually find in any photo camera. Using this screw thread, you can attach any tripod, including the flexible Gorillapod, which you can mount almost anywhere. 

 

 

HOW IT WORKS, FEATURES, APPS

 

Q. Can I use Oco2 with Oco (gen.1) cameras?

A. Sure, Oco and Oco2 are compatible and you can use both Oco and Oco2 from the same account and using the same apps.

Q. Is Oco2 battery operated? How is the device powered? Is it 100% wireless?

A. Oco2 is plugged in to the power outlet by an enclosed power adaptor and a USB-to-microUSB cable. We don’t have a battery inside the camera; however our system can detect a lost connection to either power or WiFi. In that case, you will receive a mobile alert telling you that the Oco2 has lost its connection.

Q. Does Oco2 Move (Pan / Tilt)?

A. No, it doesn’t, but the 140-degree wide angle is enough to view the entire room, so you just don’t need to pan and tilt!

 

Q. Does Oco2 have a zoom?

A. Yes, Oco2 has 8x digital zoom.

Q. Can I use Oco2 outdoors?

A. You can use Oco outdoors. However, the camera is not waterproof and is designed to be an indoor camera. So, if you can mount it under a tent, so it's hidden from the rain, then there will be no problem. The operating temperature for the camera is 14ºF–122ºF / -10°C–+50°C. The operating humidity is ~ 15–85%.

Q. Can I turn it off (privacy mode)?

A. Yes, you can turn it off. You can do it via the app or camera can be turned off automatically when you come home (using geofencing via IFTTT).

Q. What happens if the power goes out? What if someone steals or smashes my Oco2?

A. In case Oco2 loses connection to either power, you will receive a mobile alert telling you that Oco2 has lost its connection. You will be able to then see footage leading up to that incident.

Q. What happens if the Wi-Fi goes out?

A. Oco2 has SD-card support for local storage. If you have a SD card inserted, the camera records to the SD card when the Wi-Fi goes out, and you can access this footage from your phone as soon as the camera connects to the Cloud again.

Q. Can I use multiple phones with my Oco2?

A. You can use as many phones as you wish with the same account. You can also share your camera access with other users.

Q. Can I share my camera access with my family members?

A. Yes, using the app or web-account you can share the camera access with your family members, friends, or colleagues. The number depends on the price plan. On the free price plan, you can share the camera with 4 other users.

Q. How does Oco2 work?  How does it communicate with my mobile device?

A. Once you have set up your Oco2 smart camera, you can begin to monitor your home. You can watch a live stream any time via your Web Browser, iOS, Android mobile apps, or Mac OS, Windows, and Linux apps. Once the camera detects a motion or sound, it compresses and encrypts the video and sends a notification to the App or user’s email and records either the first 10 seconds of the event or the whole event (if the user is subscribed to one of the cloud recording plans). Because Oco uses self-learning algorithms, it gets smarter every day and learns to avoid false triggers such as tree movement in the window, etc. The video is stored in the cloud for 24 hours (can be extended up to 30 days with paid plans).

Q. Will Oco2 work with Android, Blackberry, Windows? When will my platform be supported? What smartphones does Oco2 work with?

A. You can have access to your camera via web account, apps for iOS, Android, Mac OS, Windows, and Linux. Oco2 works with any iPhone, iPad и iPod touch with iOS 7 or later and Android devices with Android 4.1 or later.

Advanced features such as Camera Grid are available for desktop monitoring, so those with multiple cameras can arrange screens to see views from each Oco camera all at one time on one frame.

Q. How fast should my Internet be?

A. Oco2 Camera requires a broadband Internet connection with an average bandwidth of 0.5–1.0 Mbit/s. The camera can adapt its video quality to fit the currently available bandwidth.

Q. Can I make my camera public and embed live feed from it on my website or blog?

A. Yes, you can. We provide you a simple code and you can embed it to any website and make you camera public.

Q. How much does the app cost? Are there in-app purchases?

A. All apps are free and don’t have any in-app purchases besides extended cloud price plans.

 

 

SD CARD, NOTIFICATIONS, RECORDINGS

Q. What are the subscription costs of Oco2?

A. Every Oco2 comes with free motion and sound alerts and 10-second clips of events for the past 24 hours, which is enough for most home use-cases. You can understand what was going on when camera detected the motion or sound. Optional subscription plans are available for extended cloud video storage and additional sharing options that range from $5 a month (or $50 a year) for 1 day cloud storage of extended video to $19 a month (or $199 a year) for 30 days.

Oco 2 has a hybrid storage option, so you can avoid storage fees by using the SD card.

Q. How do I access video that has been captured?

A. Oco2 smart camera uses Ivideon Cloud Service for the video and has mobile alerts and push notifications so you can see what is happening at home instantly. You can access a live stream or footage from your laptop, smartphone, or tablet from anywhere, at anytime.  

Q. Is there a Timeline feature? Can I see what has happened in the past?

A. With extended plans enabled, you can view Timeline for all camera motion- and sound-triggered recordings in the past. You can scroll back in time and view a video stream from a particular moment.

Q. How do the Smart notifications work? What type of notifications could I have?

A. When the camera detects a motion or sound, it sends an email and/or alert to your phone (depending on your settings).

Q. How Oco2 camera works with SD card?

A. Our cameras give you the flexibility to choose whether you want to store data on our servers, or you want to store data locally. With Oco2, you can use a SD card as a free local storage. It can be an addition to Cloud Storage or your single video storage location. 

If you inserted a SD card into Oco2 and you have a free cloud plan, you can use the SD card as a free storage. To store a video archive on an SD card, we recommend you to use microSD up to 128 GB with speed class 6 or higher. You can access your footage from anywhere using apps.

If you have an extended plan and the camera records into the Cloud, it uses the SD card as a backup storage and records to the SD card only when Wi-Fi goes out. In this case, you can access your footage from anywhere using apps as soon as camera is online again.

Q. Can I adjust motion and sound detection sensitivity settings?

A. Yes, you can turn on/off motion and sound detection sensors and adjust its sensitivity

Q. How does Self-Learning algorithm exactly work?

A. Our self-learning algorithm makes Oco2 smarter by the hour as you use it. All videos are first analyzed by the camera and then sent to the Cloud. That’s where the magic happens. The Cloud learns to avoid movements that are frequently repeated (such as shadows, cars passing by, etc.) so you are not inundated with endless false notifications.

Q. Does Oco2 camera work when there is no movement?

A. Oco2 is runs constantly. You can watch the live streaming video from your app at any time you want it. But the video is not saved to the Cloud when there is no motion or sound detected.

Q. Can I schedule notifications? Turn off notifications? 

A. Yes, you have these settings!

Q. How can I save/export video from Oco2 to my device/computer?

A. Export is a free feature and only the length of one clip is limited by your price plan. Export is available from your web-account. For free price plan you can export from your camera's SD card an unlimited number of clips (each up to 1 hour long) to your PC or Mac.

Q. Do I need to use your Cloud? Can I run my own storage server/FTP server/backend?

A. Our Cloud is required to take advantage of our self-learning system and advanced algorithms; the camera’s data needs to be analyzed on our cloud system. Oco2 can store your footage in the SD card as a local storage as well. A separate FTP/Backend is not supported by Oco2 as the data needs to be analyzed in our Cloud for the learning capabilities to work.

 

 

TECHNICAL DETAILS AND SECURITY

Q. Which Wi-Fi networks is Oco2 compatible with?

A. The Oco2 camera is compatible with 2.4GHz and 5GHz 802.11 a/b/g/n networks

Q. How secure is it? How secure is my footage?

A. Our servers are certified for security with the following standards: ISO 27001, PCI DSS, and SOC 1. For encryption, we use AES-256 key (means Advanced Encryption Standard 256 bits key approved by the NSA for protecting "SECRET" and "TOP SECRET" classified US-government information. However, like with any online service, we encourage users to use strong passwords and take measures to keep private information safe.

All video content stored on the SD card of Oco2 is private and inaccessible unless you have it set up to link to the Cloud.

Q. How does Oco ensure privacy of the video that is captured?  What if the video gets in the wrong hands?  If your phone gets in the wrong hands, will others be able to access your video?  

A. All video content is compressed and encrypted, and users own their content. If the phone or any other device is taken by someone, you should use your device’s security measures to disable it (like Find My iPhone feature by Apple where you can turn it remotely off). In addition, you can login via any browser and change the password to the account to prevent access through the app.

Q. Will there be the ability to do firmware updates to the Oco2 camera?

A. Yes! We have OTA (Over-The-Air) upgrade capabilities in the camera, which will allow you to update your product, making it even better every time we deliver you new firmware update.

Q. Why did you choose Ivideon as your service provider?

A. Ivideon is the most highly rated video surveillance software with over 1 million users across iOS and Android. Ivideon will also be available for Windows in January. With 4.5 stars at the Apple store and 4.5 at Google Play, Ivideon has the highest rated App on the market.

 

INTEGRATIONS, GEOFENCING

Q. Does it work with… (my thermostat, connected lock, camera, etc.)?

A. With simple IFTTT (https://ifttt.com/oco_camera) integration, Oco2 can be connected in two clicks to a variety of Smart Home Devices. For example, you can make you smart Light Bulb blink red when Oco2 tracks motion, or your smart thermostat can automatically turn Oco2 on when you are leaving the house.

Q. How can I use geofencing? Can I turn off the camera when I’m home and turn it on when I’m away? 

A. Yes, you can use ready IFTTT recipes for iOS and Android devices to turn off the camera (or just notifications) when you come home and turn the camera (or notifications) on when you leave it.

 

OTHER QUESTIONS

Q. What about a warranty?

A. We provide a 1-year limited warranty for our Oco2 Camera. If something goes wrong, just send us a support request and we’ll fix it.

It can be an addition to Cloud Storage or your single video storage location. If you inserted a SD card into Oco2 and you have a free cloud plan, you can use the SD card as a free storage. To store a video archive on an SD card, we recommend you to use microSD up to 128 GB with speed class 6 or higher. You can access your footage from anywhere using apps.If you have an extended plan and the camera records into the Cloud, it uses the SD card as a backup storage and records to the SD card only when Wi-Fi goes out. In this case, you can access your footage from anywhere using apps as soon as camera is online again.Q. Can I adjust motion and sound detection sensitivity settings?A. Yes, you can turn on/off motion and sound detection sensors and adjust its sensitivityQ. How does Self-Learning algorithm exactly work?A. Our self-learning algorithm makes Oco2 smarter by the hour as you use it. All videos are first analyzed by the camera and then sent to the Cloud. That’s where the magic happens. The Cloud learns to avoid movements that are frequently repeated (such as shadows, cars passing by, etc.) so you are not inundated with endless false notifications.Q. Does Oco2 camera work when there is no movement?A. Oco2 is runs constantly. You can watch the live streaming video from your app at any time you want it. But the video is not saved to the Cloud when there is no motion or sound detected.Q. Can I schedule notifications? Turn off notifications? A. Yes, you have these settings!Q. How can I save/export video from Oco2 to my device/computer?A. Export is a free feature and only the length of one clip is limited by your price plan. Export is available from your web-account. For free price plan you can export from your camera's SD card an unlimited number of clips (each up to 1 hour long) to your PC or Mac.Q. Do I need to use your Cloud? Can I run my own storage server/FTP server/backend?A. Our Cloud is required to take advantage of our self-learning system and advanced algorithms; the camera’s data needs to be analyzed on our cloud system. Oco2 can store your footage in the SD card as a local storage as well. A separate FTP/Backend is not supported by Oco2 as the data needs to be analyzed in our Cloud for the learning capabilities to work.  TECHNICAL DETAILS AND SECURITYQ. Which Wi-Fi networks is Oco2 compatible with?A. The Oco2 camera is compatible with 2.4GHz and 5GHz 802.11 a/b/g/n networksQ. How secure is it? How secure is my footage?A. Our servers are certified for security with the following standards: ISO 27001, PCI DSS, and SOC 1. For encryption, we use AES-256 key (means Advanced Encryption Standard 256 bits key approved by the NSA for protecting "SECRET" and "TOP SECRET" classified US-government information. However, like with any online service, we encourage users to use strong passwords and take measures to keep private information safe.All video content stored on the SD card of Oco2 is private and inaccessible unless you have it set up to link to the Cloud.Q. How does Oco ensure privacy of the video that is captured?  What if the video gets in the wrong hands?  If your phone gets in the wrong hands, will others be able to access your video?  A. All video content is compressed and encrypted, and users own their content. If the phone or any other device is taken by someone, you should use your device’s security measures to disable it (like Find My iPhone feature by Apple where you can turn it remotely off). In addition, you can login via any browser and change the password to the account to prevent access through the app.Q. Will there be the ability to do firmware updates to the Oco2 camera?A. Yes! We have OTA (Over-The-Air) upgrade capabilities in the camera, which will allow you to update your product, making it even better every time we deliver you new firmware update.Q. Why did you choose Ivideon as your service provider?A. Ivideon is the most highly rated video surveillance software with over 1 million users across iOS and Android. Ivideon will also be available for Windows in January. With 4.5 stars at the Apple store and 4.5 at Google Play, Ivideon has the highest rated App on the market. INTEGRATIONS, GEOFENCINGQ. Does it work with… (my thermostat, connected lock, camera, etc.)?A. With simple IFTTT (https://ifttt.com/oco_camera) integration, Oco2 can be connected in two clicks to a variety of Smart Home Devices. For example, you can make you smart Light Bulb blink red when Oco2 tracks motion, or your smart thermostat can automatically turn Oco2 on when you are leaving the house.Q. How can I use geofencing? Can I turn off the camera when I’m home and turn it on when I’m away? A. Yes, you can use ready IFTTT recipes for iOS and Android devices to turn off the camera (or just notifications) when you come home and turn the camera (or notifications) on when you leave it. OTHER QUESTIONSQ. What about a warranty?A. We provide a 1-year limited warranty for our Oco2 Camera. If something goes wrong, just send us a support request and we’ll fix it.

story:
We are hoping to reach our $500 goal by the beginning of July '13 to upgrade our photography equipment. There is so much work we would like to do and are capable of doing, however our current equipment is just not up to the task. Our current equipment is rather limiting. With an upgrade to our photography equipment we can actually create the kind of work we are capable of. We are beginning our donations with as little as $1. This investment is not only an investment in our company, it is also an investment in our youth. So please take a moment to make a pledge today. We are really in need of your contributions to take us to our next stage. There is so much we want to do, however with our current equipment it is just not going to happen. Please take a moment and make a contribution today. We have 15 days to raise the $500 needed for our basic upgrade. If and when we reach our basic goal please do not hesitate to continue your donation effort. There is so much more we need to do. In all actuality the more donations we receive the more we can do. Help us to help you. The more support we recieve the more we can do to empower our young people.

Best JT GAZE

story:
WHAT IS PODO?

 

Podo is the world's first "stick and shoot" camera. Simply:

•Stick Podo onto a nearby surface.

•Shoot awesome photos, hands-free. 

USE CASES

Your phone is great, but it's not always the right camera for the job.

Our customers love how easy it is to use Podo to enhance their lifestyles:

 

Everyday adventures:

  • Self-portraits: Ditch your selfie stick for good.
  • Group photos: Fit everyone in on the very first try.
  • Family: Fun for even the most camera-shy little-ones.
  • Animals: Get up-close on their level with your pets.
  • Food: Snap a recipe step-by-step or get that perfect food pic.
  • Cars: Use Podo as an easy backup cam.

For your passions:

  • Photography: A fun and creative addition to your gear bag.
  • Travel: Never miss a photo op, without relying on strangers.
  • Style & Fashion: Check your outfit from the back, and take your #ootd.
  • Fitness: Check your form, yoga poses, and of course, progress pics!
  • Sports: Record your swing, or watch a basket from the back board.
  • Artists: Dancers, musicians, stop-motion animators, painters, etc.
  • Time Lapse: Set any interval for the easiest time lapse ever.

Perfect for events:

  • Weddings/Parties: Capture it all automatically with time lapse.
  • Concerts: Get every angle of the venue without running any cables.
  • Multi-angle: Use multiple Podos to capture everything at once.
  • Photo booth: Everyone loves a good photo booth!

FEATURE HIGHLIGHTS

Large Pixel Size

The pixels on our sensor (2.2 μm) are 50% bigger than those in the iPhone 7 (1.5 μm) and the Galaxy S7 (1.4 μm).

Bigger pixels collect more light, leading to increased dynamic range, improved low-light performance, and reduced noise. Bigger pixels = better picture.

Choosing a 5MP camera allows bigger pixels within the same sensor size, and is enough megapixels to print at 14"x11" full resolution.

See sample images here.

Micro-Adhesive Sticky Pad

Podo sticks with a quick press, then peels right off. It physically "grips" the wall so it doesn't wear out, and you can clean it with water. Think gecko's feet...but on a camera.

No other stands, clips, or mounts required. Just slip Podo in your pocket and you're good to go.

Sound like magic? It feels like it too! Just wait until you try it yourself.

With care and cleaning, the pad should last indefinitely. If for any reason the pad loses its grip within 6 months, we'll replace it for free.

For a short video on how it works, click here.

The Podo App

Our camera may be tiny, but it becomes powerful by partnering with your phone. Bluetooth technology lets your phone act as a complete wireless controller.

  1. Wake Podo up and start the preview, all from within the app
  2. Adjust settings, hit the shutter, or start a countdown
  3. Choose your favorite shots and transfer them to your phone

When you're done, just stick Podo in your pocket and it will return to sleep automatically. 

App Modes

PHOTO: Simple. Fun. Our bread and butter.

LAPSE: Set any interval for the easiest time lapse ever. (Does not require connection with phone)

VIDEO: 720p HD video at 30 fps. Your phone records the audio like a wireless mic.

MULTI (new): Capture photo, video, or lapse with up to 6 Podos simultaneously in a unique and immersive way.

BOOTH (new): Easily provide the classic photo booth experience. Silly faces are highly recommended!

SOLO (new): Activate tap-gesture controls and put your phone away. 

As we update the app, Podo will gain even more features over time!

More Features

  • Fully rotating hinge lets you shoot any angle 
  • Accelerometer automatically orients the photos LEDs indicate Podo's actions (not for flash) 
  • Adjustable countdown timer 8GB memory holds thousands of photos 
  • Li-ion battery lasts 1,000 photos or 2 weeks in standby

TECH SPECS

  • Size: 1.5" x 1.5" x 1.3" (4.5 x 4.5 x 3 cm)
  • Weight: 1.5 oz (43 g)
  • Sensor: 5 MP (2.2 μm pixels)
  • Video: 720p 30fps
  • Lens: 90° wide-angle, glass
  • Memory: 8 GB
  • 8-LED ring
  • Bluetooth connectivity
  • Accelerometer
  • Rechargeable battery (up to 1.5 hrs. video)

ABOUT US

The founders, Eddie, Jae, and Sam, began as friends and roommates at UC Berkeley. We got tired of someone always getting left out of group photos and needing cables to transfer photos from Jae's DSLR. We wanted something much more versatile and easy to use, so we made it!

We raised $427,000 on Kickstarter last year from over 3,600 amazing backers. Podo shipped worldwide, won global design awards, and starred on TV, magazines, and even a music video. This year, the new and improved Podo raised $761,130 from 8,802 backers.

Podo represents our passion, our team’s grit, and our conviction that technology should be fun and simple. Thank you to every fan and supporter who’s shown us love along the way.

Photo transfer times vary with phone model and strength of Bluetooth connection. Typical transfer time for a 5MP photo is 2-4 seconds.

LAPSE: Set any interval for the easiest time lapse ever. (Does not require connection with phone)

Adjustable countdown timer 8GB memory holds thousands of photos

TECH SPECS

Weight: 1.5 oz (43 g)
Sensor: 5 MP (2.2 μm pixels)
Video: 720p 30fps
Lens: 90° wide-angle, glass
Memory: 8 GB

Bluetooth connectivity

We raised $427,000 on Kickstarter last year from over 3,600 amazing backers. Podo shipped worldwide, won global design awards, and starred on TV, magazines, and even a music video. This year, the new and improved Podo raised $761,130 from 8,802 backers.

story:
Short Summary

This film is about three unlucky toy soldiers being played with by a young boy with a wild imagination. This is a war film and will have graphic content but will also be comedic. It will have an early 1970's theme to it as well. My team and I are very excited to get started on this project. The script and storyboard are nearly complete. Let me introduce the crew working on the project.

Daniel Helmus

Co-writer of Toy Soldiers and will be playing a main character in the story. Dan has been my best friend for twelve years now and was in some of my first films. He has recently acted in our films like Star Wars: Dark Shroud as a stormtrooper and played the antagonist Mark in Fear The Fighter our latest film. He is a great member of the crew and is very excited to get out on the battlefield.

Jack Liddy

Special Effects artist of Toy Soldiers and will be playing a small role in the story but has a much bigger job. He will be our cameraman working with me making sure that all of the shots we get are solid. Jack is very talented with the camera and VFX. He has recently acted in our films Star Wars: Dark Shroud as the protagonist and played the trainer in Fear The Fighter our latest film.

Brendan Miske

Director and writer of Toy Soldiers. I have been making films since the seventh grade and look to continue studying film in college. I hope that this project will be another great edition to my portfolio.  Working with Jack and Dan is fantastic because they are hard workers and are very reliable. I will be playing a main character in this film as well and I am very excited to work on this next big project.

Spenser Sembrat

Last but not least is Spenser, who has recently joined the team and has been a great edition. He will be playing a main character as well in Toy Soldiers. He has helped us on our most recent film Fear The Fighter playing a small role but also worked as a cameraman as well. Cannot wait to see what he can do. It will be his first big role in anything we have ever done and he too is excited to get out there.

What We Need & What You Get

For our film we are now in the process of crowdfunding which is always a great way to budget a movie. Unlike Fear The Fighter which was a very low budget movie, this film will require more in order to make it look more realistic since it is a war film set in the 1970's.

Costumes, Props, & Practical Effects

Most of the money donated will go towards the costumes and props used in the film. Costumes will require pieces like helmets, military button downs, military cargo pants, personalized dog tags, airsoft guns, tactical chest pieces, belts, canteens, fake cigarettes, face makeup, and back packs. We want the costumes to look as realistic as possible so that they are believable. The left over donations we have will go towards practical effects. We need fake grenades, old 1970's military style walkie talkies, fake explosives, big bags of soil, and much more.

With your help we will be able to make this our best film yet. Our goal is $1000 and any donations you make your name will be put into the credits of the film and we will give you a big shoutout for helping us out. So you could donate $1 and could have your name at the end credits. Our solemn purpose is to entertain you and hopefully get a laugh or two as well. We hope that you can help us out and we will highly appreciate any donation made towards the project because without you guys we won't be able to make this our greatest film ever.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help us out. Get the word out we want people to know about Toy Soldiers. We want our audience to be excited about our next film and want them to watch it and hear their feedback once we release it. I hope that anyone reading this will be able to contribute in some way. Even if donating isn't an option for you, tell people about our upcoming film!

story:
[ENGLISH]
Hey my dear people. :)
As some of you know, I have been taking photos for a while now and once in a while I have new ideas that get easier and easier to implement thanks to Photoshop. Since Cosplay is a great passion of mine, I also love to put the beautiful and creative costumes which let us immerse ourselves in another world beautifully in scene.
Sure, my composing work is still not perfect but I work very hard on it. Unfortunately, I notice that I nevertheless need some better equipment for one or the other project. I already have put a lot of money into this hobby (be it camera, new lens, flash, softboxes, etc.), but there are still a few things I need for my new projects.
Here comes your part of the game! I would like to start a small donation campaign. Of course I offer you the possibility that you also get something for your money. (Prints, posters, calendars, key rings, fanings, etc.) Any small donation would make a financial contribution to the next projects.
 
Thank you for taking the time to read this text.
Your Bibigraphy
 
 
[DEUTSCH]
Hey meine lieben. :)
Wie einige wissen, fotografiere ich jetzt schon eine Weile und habe auch immer wieder neue Ideen, die dank Photoshop immer leichter in die Tat umzusetzen sind. Da Cosplay einfach eine große Leidenschaft von mir ist, liebe ich es, die schönen und kreativ umgesetzten Kostüme, die uns in eine andere Welt eintauchen lassen, auch schön in Szene zu setzten.
Klar sind meine Composingarbeiten noch lange nicht perfekt, aber ich arbeite sehr hart daran. Leider merke ich aber mittlerweile, dass ich dennoch für das ein oder andere Projekt etwas besseres Equipment benötige. Ich habe schon sehr viel Geld in dieses Hobby gesteckt (sei es Kamera, neues Objektiv, Blitz, Softboxen usw.), aber dennoch fehlen verschiedene Sachen, die ich für meine neuen Projekte benötige.
Hier kommt Ihr ins Spiel! Gerne würde ich einen kleinen Spendengang ins Leben rufen. Natürlich biete ich Euch die Möglichkeit, dass ihr auch was für euer Geld bekommt. (Prints, Poster, Kalender, Schlüsselanhänger,Fansings, usw.) Jede noch so kleine Spende würde mich finanziell für die nächsten Projekte sehr entlasten.
 
Danke, dass Ihr euch die Zeit genommen habt, den Text zu lesen.
Eure Bibigraphy

story:
As most of you know Chris and I have had a rough year. On top of all the other stuff going on, our home was broken into and all of Chris's camera gear was stolen. Photography is our therapy- its how we've dealt with all the unfortunate events over the last 6 months. We go out on walks and take pictures to distract ourselves and as a reminder that there is still beauty out in the world.

Its been very hard to not have that in our lives to help us cope. It was our "happy" place.

My hope is to give Chris part of his happy place back for his birthday. Before this all happened I had bought a nice camera bag for his birthday and I'd love for him to have something to put in there- something to get started with again... a fresh start.
story_txt: As most of you know Chris and I have had a rough year. On top of all the other stuff going on, our home was broken into and all of Chris's camera gear was stolen. Photography is our therapy- its how we've dealt with all the unfortunate events over the last 6 months. We go out on walks and take pictures to distract ourselves and as a reminder that there is still beauty out in the world. Its been very hard to not have that in our lives to help us cope. It was our "happy" place.My hope is to give Chris part of his happy place back for his birthday. Before this all happened I had bought a nice camera bag for his birthday and I'd love for him to have something to put in there- something to get started with again... a fresh start.

story:
Jonathan does it for love, not money. Let's show him some LOVE (and money)!

  • Since at least 2003, Jonathan Nuss has been taking photos at all kinds of skate events.
  • For most of these, he does it for free. He puts his heart, soul, and crazy amounts of time and energy into capturing the essence of longboarding and providing us with live music sets and AMAZING PROFILE PHOTOS. 
  • When you pay a photographer for a head shot or an action shot at a professional sporting event, you are usually dropping between 20 and 50 dollars, but we all get them for no dollars!
  • It's time to pay him back and help him replace the lens that got broken at the latest Toronto SlideFu, as part of Board Meeting 2014:  http://instagram.com/p/s8WUpzs8rb/?modal=true

What We Need:

  • Jon says the replacement will cost him $700, so we've put the goal at $500 to help him out. If it goes above and beyond, you KNOW he'll put that to good use on equipment to keep us photographed and/or dancing.

How much?

  • $2, 5, $10, $20, $50, $100... whatever you can afford!
  • Any amount you can contribute will help and go directly to Jon.

Thank you for being an awesome community. Let's do this!

(campaign photo by Scott Harrison)

story:
Greetings ! My name is Larry T Hill
(you might know me asFrugalist Massive, Sinbad, D man, Nody or Dylan)

Yup, no specific campaign clip sorry but I’ve got a little one take rambling audio spiel here if you like. It’s here, you could open it in a background tab and imagine some editing. Until I re-record it. Thanks for your imagination.

Playing street style with my original busking amp on my bike at the
Love on a Real Train Warehouse Party in Melbourne

This little dream

I’ve been a musician for thirteen years or so, mainly playing drums and percussion, in bands you’ve probably never heard of. In late 2008, I left the busyness of Sydney’s legendary Figureight Sustainable Event Production Inc. to find a more rewarding way of being creative and experiencing more of this great Australian land. Slow solo travel left me missing music creation and I lacked the bandmates or instruments to do so. So I secretly and slowly began writing songs with a looping app. This was fresh, new and scary: I was slowly teaching myself how to sing, loop and craft songs all at once. I took this on in a radically self-sufficient way, diving into hitchhike touring whilst developing the performance on the fly and now I'm seeking support for the first time.

 

As a migrant I had my first flight at 3.5wks old and a very mobile early childhood. More recently, I have been interested in overland alternative transport and have not flown in the past 10 years. This ethos is a strong part of the vision as I sail towards Sri Lanka from mid july, crewing other peoples boats to make my way there.

 

Here I'm meant to say: "What I Need & What You Get"

The focus is funding two things:

$530 for the beautiful Roland AC-33 battery powered busking amplifier. Virtually impossible to track down second hand because they are so good. My friend Lee Hardisty has one and would almost signup for being an ambassador for them. He uses it for everything from busking to playing at weddings and can hardly stop raving about it. This will be a replacement/upgrade for my Roland Mobile Cube which I scored on ebay for $90 and had recently stolen in Coober Pedy on this trip up. :(

 

$550 to fund filmmaker Tim Parish to shoot, edit and publish a clip for my new tune "Croc Fever" which i'm also hoping to enter into the NT song of the year awards shortly. Tim is a talented visual artist who has developed Verb Studios, a hybrid media art studio featuring his diverse body of work ranging from short films, music videos, documentaries. Also check out his work athttp://vimeo.com/verb or on the gallery tab above.

 

Croc Fever Recording is here (open in a background tab to listen) its the basic live to 2track mix, produced swiftly for NT song of the year awards submission: no luck there however)

 

$70 buffer ? There are not-so-visible crowdfunding and credit card fees which are included in this initial figure. Please preference straight credit card payments over Paypal if possible.

 

Incentives?

I’m offering a few incentives for some of the contributions as per the usual model here, but I also welcome straight donations in the spirit of gifting. One of my challenges is being time poor and - through perpetual travel-touring I have limited resources in my backpack. I don't carry a laptop so I'm writing to you now from a Library computer in Darwin. Even big successful campaigns seem to have issues with keeping up with all the requests.


Left: My original eBay score for $90 ($250+ new), Mobile Cube - the one that was stolen. Right: The amazing roland AC-33 - Busking amp with an amazing sound. Yes, I am using the loss of my little amp above as an opportunity to upgrade as well. As nice and handy as the little mobile cube it was hard-pressed keeping up with road noise when playing on the street.

Moooore? You want more?

If the campaign goes well and clears the target I can look at some other gear upgrades and offering Tim more funds. In terms of gear my little ipod touch, which I got for the special looping apps a few years ago could do with an upgrade to an ipad which goes for around $250 second hand online. It’s not just the size of the screen but the actual processing power as well. This would be great for the looping workshops in particular with youth. All the great looping and live music apps are only on the iProducts unfortunately.

The Vision

My initial vision with this campaign is to test the crowdfunding waters whilst hoping to elevate my art through quality mobile amplification and a nice clip to accompany my troppo tune. I want to get back out there playing on the street with a good sound, it has been a small nightmare trying to sort out battery powered systems to play market gigs up here. On my sailing journey I’m going to need to have my own self sufficient setup for keeping crew amused and performing at odd spots along the way.

 

Croc Fever?

I would love to showcase the Croc Fever tune in a nice clip that can be shot whilst Tim and myself both happen to be in the Top End together. Tim also leaves in mid July heading for Europe.

I hope this campaign will go well then I will take on a bigger one for support on my motherland voyage. Theres a little teaser of Croc Fever on this clip over here.. as you will see it will be great to showcase this tune in a more polished and fun way than this clip which ends because we ran out of space on the memory cards.

 

It’s about the tricky challenge of wanting to swim in the stinking hot “build-up season” which is when the Crocodiles are active in the rivers, swimming holes and beaches.

What I have managed to do already without financial support (CV style)

  • National hitch-hike touring over 30 000kms to play at many of Australia's wonderful music festivals such as Woodford Folk Festival (QLD), Rainbow Serpent Festival (VIC), Burning Seed (OZ Burning Man in NSW), Wide Open Space Festival near Alice Springs, Darwin Festival and Gurruwilling Eclipse Festival in Arnhem Land.

  • That Roo clip and all my video clips and audio recordings so far have been produced in a completely DIY and zero-budget fashion. I have been blessed with generous filmmakers who were happy to have a play with filming me in various settings. (roo clip was a Canadian WWOOFer in Sunshine Coast, QLD Australia who liked the tunes).

  • I’ve buiḻt a relatively slick website from the ground up using free tools http://quietbackroad.tumblr.com - this has helped greatly with booking gigs and playshops. Much square time.

  • Established a unique performance which can be adapted to almost any environment.

  • Developed the looping playshops, supporting emerging artists, youth and other musicians to get music out of their heads and into live vocal looping.

  • Created digital USB albums as an alternative to CDs and a handy, re-usable way to make digital music and videos tangible objects.   

My 2012 hitchhike tour. 28 000kms in that year. Living a dream, playing: Songlines Stage Woodford Folk Festival

 

 

Non monetary Contributions

Not feeling cashed up? don't have a credit card ? I would love you consider these contribution options.

  • Jump onto your networks and share this campaign, there’s some sharable tools near the video at the top.

  • Assist with your knowledge, research skills or resources. For my trip I am currently studying: Sailing, Sinhalese Language and continuing my creative practice.

  • Research Assistance: Sailing travel safety, Health care and disease prevention, Insurance, Visas  etc

  • Computer Assistance : I am spending a whole lot of time on computers, it took a few office hours days just to research, prepare and construct this campaign. I am grateful for any help with web 2.0, social media and web stuff. Also, video and photo editing - do you have these skills?

 

Thank you for considering!

Giant gratitude - Larry T Hill

At woodford festival after having an amazing time playing on the Songlines Stage

 

Looping playshops -embed issues again sorry..

\

 

The little USB albums, completely DIY. A Looping workshop with some fellas in Alice Springs


ABC Radio Interview :Focus - looping and hitching  http://snd.sc/13GEcrZ

 

Tim Parish clips:  Or look in the gallery tab above..

 

Donating = Loving

 

* * * * * * * * * *  

Extra info if you are interested:

 

My performance bio is this:

"With a striking solo performance, Larry T Hill crafts cheeky musical tales using just voice and a looping pedal. He records layer upon layer of his voice live on stage, creating elaborate yet fun musical pieces which you might expect to hear from a small band. Performances can be energetic and animated, soulful and outrageous, witty, pretty or sometimes just silly. The sharp beats, deep basslines and sweet harmonies will have you hooked. Singing the tunes all the way home."

 

Get your downloads here, no codes, no waiting.

Donate / Contribute as you feel.

story:
The Insta360 Air captures stunning 360-degree HD images, videos and livestreams to social media.

 

 

 

The portable camera comes in four fashionable colors. Matte black evokes a classic tone compared to the contemporary crisp white and silver version, or for the daring, choose a ravishing rose pink or rich gold.

 

The compact camera is lightweight and ultra portable. Compared with conventional 360° cameras the Insta360 Air is designed as an extension of the smartphone rather than a bulky add-on.

 

                        360° Photo Demo 1                                     360° Photo Demo 2

Featuring an advanced 210° dual fish-eye lens and real-time image stitching the Insta360 Air captures images in the round, so nothing and no one is out of shot. With 3K stills and 2K videos (3K ready with selected Android smartphones e.g. Samsung S7), the camera boasts professional resolution at an everyday price.

 

The powerful device can also be used as a 360 webcam which users connect to laptops via the multifunctional extension cable to capture 360° video or livestream for longer periods of time.

 

The Insta360 Air’s built-in advanced stabilization algorithm increases precision and makes it easy for everyone to capture smooth panoramic shots. 

 

 

Livestream parties, gigs and festivals to any 360-degree livestreaming platform such as YouTube or share images and videos easily with one-click uploads to Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Messenger and WhatsApp.

 

 

The Insta360 Air is simple to use. Once connected to an Android device the app automatically activates, which ensures the perfect pano shot is never missed. The app also features image and video editing tools so that users can create visual masterpieces specific to their taste.

 

 

Shoot stunning 360° photos and videos with the Insta360 Air, switch to VR mode and use a VR viewer or headset to experience them in a truly immersive way.

 

 

 

 

We are an ambitious and dedicated team of 200 people. Our dream is to create the most advanced yet affordable 360° cameras and accessories available to everyone. We can’t wait to see the awesome pictures and videos our backers will make with the Insta360 Air. With your help we will bring this pioneering smartphone camera to all Android users.

 

 

     

 

 

Is the Insta360 Air compatible with Type-C connector？

Yes, it is compatible with both a micro USB and a Type-C connector.

Is there any protection for the camera?

Yes, a well-designed rubber protector will come with the package.

Where will the 360° images and videos be stored？

360° images and videos will be stored directly on the user’s Android device.

What is the image size？

Each image is almost 3-4MB.

How can I share the panoramic images with my friends？

With one click users can share the 360° photos and videos immediately with friends via social media, this includes Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, WhatsApp, WeChat and Messenger.

Does Insta360 Air support livestreaming？

Yes, Insta360 Air can livestream from the Android smartphone to any 360° live platform such as YouTube.

What is the resolution of the Insta360 Air camera？

Insta360 Air is featured with a resolution of 3008x1504 (3K) for images and 2560 x 1280 (2K) videos. On some Android systems, the videos can have 3008 x 1504 (3K) resolution. This includes the latest Android mobiles such as Samsung S7, S7 edge, and Huawei P9.

What is the camera size and weight？

38mm(diameter) × 39.5mm(height). And it weighs 26.5g. 

Can I edit the photo and video before sharing？

Photos and videos can be edited within the Insta360 Air Android app. This includes exposure and white balance filters and a self-timer function.

Can I view the 360° photos and videos with VR Glass？

Yes, put the Insta360 Air in VR mode and use with VR Glass or cardboard for a truly immersive experience.

Do I need to install apps to use with the Insta360 Air camera？

Yes, please download the Insta360 Air app.

How long can the battery last when recording a video?

The Insta360 Air does not include battery inside. So it depends on the phone battery and memory.

Does it work with iPhones?

Insta360 Air is only compatible with Android Phones. The Insta360 Nano is the version for iPhones, it is already on the market and can be bought on Amazon here.

Does it come with a transfer cable to use with laptops or computers?

Yes, it does. But just make sure it is compatible with micro USB or USB Type-C.

 

Take incredible 360° selfies with the Insta360 Nano, the world's first video camera which shoots and live-streams perfect HD 360-degree stills and video directly from your iPhone.

The compact camera simply clips onto an iPhone 7, 7 Plus, 6, 6 Plus, 6s or 6s Plus. You can then share your images and videos instantly with your social media followers on Twitter and Facebook. The Insta360 packaging is easily converted into a Google Cardboard VR viewer, to let followers, friends and family instantly experience users’ immersive video masterpieces.

Learn more about the Insta360 Nano here.

 

Established in 2014, Shenzhen Arashi Vision Co. Ltd is a consumer technology company committed to creating the world’s most advanced and affordable 360-degree cameras. Designed lightweight and portable the products can be used in tourism, real estate, mass media, events and conferences, among other industries. With a vested interest in virtual reality, users can view the content created by the cameras in VR headsets for a truly immersive experience.

For more details please visit: http://www.insta360.com/

 

Please fill out the Insta360 Air Warranty Application at http://insta360.mikecrm.com/n3AJDO or contact our customer service team on service@insta360.com

story:
My name is Kelly Mason, and I am a 23-year-old photographer from Seattle, WA. I have been sitting here trying to verbalize my love for the art in a way that "resonates with the reader" for a few hours now, but so far I am coming up short. Photography isn't just a part of my life; it lies within the way I view the world. Photography is rooted in my mind in a way that I cannot adequately describe with words, but I hope my passion is conveyed through my work.

I have been shooting seriously for about 6 years now. My subject matter ranges from live band to candid lifestyle portraits, but most of my portfolio is comprised of music. As far as clientele goes, I have shot the Vans Warped Tour three times, Identity Festival, and countless other friends and shows (but those are two of my recent favorites).

On May 19th... oh that fateful day... my camera bag was stolen on a work trip at the Bamboozle Festival in New Jersey. I lost over $4,000 worth of gear, and per the suggestion of countless friends I am running this campaign in an attempt to help recover some of the cost so I can buy new equipment. 

I filed a police report with all of my serial numbers and looked into every insurance option imaginable from travelers insurance to work insurance to calling Visa to see if they have any type of protection on the lenses I bought with my credit card. Nothing. The New Jersey area Craigslists haven't turned up anything either. I didn't insure any of my equipment because I never thought something like this would happen to me... of course. 

And now I am asking for your help! 

Everything I lost:

-Canon 50D
-Canon 35mm f/1.4L (my newest purchase)
-Canon 50mm f/1.4
-Canon 20mm f/2.8
-Sunpak 383 external flash
-16GB CF card 
-2GB CF card 
-Contour HD helmet camera
-Flash triggers 
-Brand new Lowepro Slingshot 202

After some thought and research, rather than directly replacing all of my gear I would like to upgrade to the 5D Mark II with another L lens. Ideally it would be amazing to raise enough money to cover everything I lost, but I am starting at $3000 to at least buy a 5D Mark II off Craigslist ($1600) and the 35mm f/1.4L ($1479) again (and cover the fees + taxes associated with the campaign).

I am not the biggest fan of asking people for money for something like this, but hopefully the added perks make it more worthwhile without devaluing my photos. Choose from anything on my Flickr or website. Some of the older photos on my Flickr may not be in existence anymore, so make sure to include your first 2-3 choices. 

Thank you so much for taking the time to read my campaign. Anything you can do to help is greatly appreciated! 

Kelly

story:
Let's Pay Back "Pops" For His Years Of Wonderful Pictures!!!

Dear Friends Of John "Pops" Dickerson,

"Pops" has been taking pictures for years around Northeast Ohio and elsewhere... and he has never asked for anything in return. I hope to be able to raise enough money to buy him a new Camera. He is now retired and on a fixed income and his current cameras are over ten years old and do not work the way they used to. If every band or event who was ever photographed by Pops and shared in the bueaty of his talents just gave a small amount there would be more than enough to buy the required "gear" to allow Pops to continue his passion!

Please consider donating to our friend "Pops"!!!

Thanks so much!

Have a groovy day!

Peace & Blessings

 

David "Dreadlock Dave" McDougald

story:
What is EasyStudio? 

EasyStudio is a Smart Lightbox with Multiple Integrated Cameras which help you snap ecommerce grade photos effortlessly. EasyStudio is PROBABLY THE SMARTEST LIGHTBOX With BUILT IN CAMERAS

---------


Who Are We

As an Internet based company, we understand Ecommerce sellers need good product photography to promote their products, just like the saying “a picture speaks a thousand STORIES”. However, a complete photo studio with full equipment (background, lightning setup, good cameras, etc) can be very costly.

Certainly, taking photos with a smartphone is easy enough. But if you aim for high quality photos that can help you to entice your web visitors and sell more, normal smartphone photography is not something you can rely on. Here is when the idea struck, why not create something affordable that can provide everything an ecommerce seller needs?

That was how EasyStudio was invented in 2016. We want to provide an all-in-one solution for all Ecommerce sellers, with low photo shooting budget guaranteed, and high quality outcome assured.

EASYSTUDIO

We provide Photography Lightboxes with multiple built in cameras and LEDs to make product photography much easier for Ecommerce sellers!

Just like the tagline "Photography Made Easy", we aim to help small business owners to simplify everything and make professional product photography possible for everyone, without having to invest heavily on photography equipment.

Here are the MAIN BENEFITS of our photo light box:

  • No expensive camera or fancy equipment needed
  • Just a smartphone to preview the shots
  • Comes with multiple built in cameras and LEDs
  • Take multiple-angle photos in ONE click
  • Images are easily transferable (with pendrive or through WiFi)
  • Simple & User-Friendly
  • Foldable & Portable  
  • Save Time
  • No Need Additional Photo Editing Softwares
KEY FEATURES
  • Snap 3 photos from 3 different angles at a time
  • Automatically remove unwanted shades and shadows
  • Download photos to Mobile Phones / Tablets / iPads /  Computers via Wifi
  • Save photos to USB Drive
  • All these are done in less than 15 seconds

The EasyStudio photo lightbox is the easiest and most efficient way to do product shooting. With multiple build in cameras and LEDs, sellers SAVE time and effort on setting up lightning, background and other prep work. High productivity and efficiency can definitely help your online business grow to a higher level.

We have been making great progress in identifying and designing a new way to simplify everything and make professional product photography possible for everyone.


Now we are pleased to invite you to join our efforts in designing and pushing for mass production and market launch. With our market know-how and your support we can make this real! The funds will be used to refine our design, comply with all the certifications and regulatory requirements, and promotion on the Social Network platform.

What's Included in EasyStudio E1 SMART Photography Lightbox: 

  1. A Main Unit (EasyStudio E1 SMART Lightbox) 
  2. Built in with 3 Built-in Cameras (5 Mega Pixels)
  3. Built in with 3 LED Strips
  4. A Set of White Colour Backdrop 
  5. A Power Brick Adapter Kit
  6. EasyStudio IOS / Android Mobile App
  7. Instruction Manual 
  8. Flatpack Box
SAMPLES OF PHOTOS TAKEN VIA EASYSTUDIO (3 Angles) 

SPECIFICATIONS
  • Physical Size of EasyStudio: 900mm (H) x 900mm (W) x 600mm (D)
  • Physical Weight of EasyStudio: Approx. 3KG
  • Photo Dimension: 2592 x 1944 pixels
  • Photo File Size: Approx 1-5 Mb per photos (depends on object size & colour)
  • Numbers of Integrated Camera: 3
  • Numbers of Photo Per Shot: 3
  • Estimated Time for Taking 3 Photos: Below 10 seconds. 
  • Maximum Size of Object: 10cm (H) x 15cm (W) x 20cm (D) ~ a Pair of Shoes
  • Transfer Photos: Via WiFi or USB Drive


MORE SAMPLES OF PHOTOS TAKEN VIA EASYSTUDIO (3 Angles) 



JOIN US ON THE EXCITING JOURNEY TO BRING EASYSTUDIO TO THE MARKET!

We now wish to invite you to join our team and help us complete the rest of this journey. Don't miss out on this once in a lifetime opportunity! With our passion and experience along with your support we can propel EasyStudio to phenomenal success!



EasyStudio is PROBABLY THE SMARTEST PHOTOGRAPHY LIGHTBOX With BUILT IN CAMERAS!

Thank you!

p/s: We are fine tuning the product design to suit the manufacturing process as well as reduce the packaging & shipping cost; the final product's look and feel might be vary from the images shown above or differ from the prototype photo above but functionality shall remain the same or better. Thank You. www.easystud.io

story:
Why REMOVU K1?

We all love to document our adventures. We found existing cameras were taking us out of the moment. We were spending too much time assembling/dissembling our gear, playing around with settings and lugging around heavy equipment. That is why we created the K1.

The K1 has a built-in LCD screen and gimbal. There is no need to attach an external monitor or connect the camera to a gimbal. K1 is extremely lightweight and compact, perfect for everyday use and traveling. All you need to do is turn the power on and start living in the moment.

 

Key Features

 

Integrated 3-Axis Motorized Stabilizer

K1 is equipped with a 3-axis stabilizing gimbal, manufacture with world class brushless DC motors. This means you get super clear images and smooth stable footage.  Check the below video shot with REMOVU K1 pre-production sample.   Watch in 4K resolution with big screen.  

 
The 3-axis gimbal stabilization of REMOVU K1 is totally different from EIS(Electronic Image Stabilization) of GoPro Hero6.  Check with your eyes from below video.   

K1 has 4 different modes to help you turn your adventures into a movie. There is Pan and Follow mode, Motion time-lapse mode and Selfie mode.

 

Stunning 4K Ultra HD @ 30FPS

Capture your life's moments in stunning 4K @ 30FPS or take beautiful 12MP photos. To ensure that everything is in the shot, the K1 has a custom designed F2.8 wide angle lens. K1 also has a 4-way joystick that allows you to control the camera's position. K1 can also capture super slow-motion in Full HD at 120FPS.

 

Film yourself easily with 'Selfie' mode

With K1's 50 centimeters' focal lens, you can get up close for those perfect self-portraits. The trigger on the back of the K1 handgrip allows you to quickly switch to 'Selfie' mode. And with the built-in 1.5" LCD screen, you can easily preview what the camera sees or playback your recorded videos and photos instantly.

 

Pocket Size & Super Light Weight

K1 is compact and lightweight. The K1, including the K1 smart battery, is only 340g. Easily control all features on the K1 with a single hand. Pack less and travel lighter with the K1.

 

Smart Battery

The K1 is equipped with a powerful interchangeable smart battery, providing up-to 4 hours of continuous filming on a single charge. To recharge, all you need is a power source; no bulky chargers are required. You won't miss another moment. You also can record video or take a photo while charging the smart battery.

 

REMOVU K1 App

The K1 mobile app for iOS and Android, allows you to control the K1 remotely.  Start/stop recording, take a photo, change camera settings, preview your footage and remote-control the camera's position.

 

Built-In Microphone and Mic Port

K1 has a high-quality built-in microphone that captures audio while recording video. Or you can use the 3.5mm jack to connect K1 to an external microphone. The K1 Accessory Kit comes with a high-sensitivity Omni-directional Microphones.

 

Feature Comparison

 

Specifications


 

What's in the K1 Package

Here's what you get with your pre-order:

 

Accessory Kit

1. Premium External Microphone:
Is an incredible Omni-directional Microphones that provide ultra high sensitivity -23dB.

2. Docking Station:
Provides an easier method for docking and charging your K1.

3. Lens Protection Cover:
Keep the K1 lens safe from scratches or dirt.

4. Protective Film:
An anti-scratch shield to protect the K1's screen from unwanted scratches.

5. Lens Cleaner:
To keep the K1 lens clean so that it captures crystal clear images.

6. Wrist Strap:
To connect the K1 to your wrist to prevent accidental drops.

 

Timeline

 

Our Story

In 2014, we released our first product, the REMOVU R1, the world's only wearable Wi-Fi remote viewer for GoPro camera.

Shortly after the R1, we released the M1+A1, a rainproof wireless microphone and receiver for GoPro cameras. Another world's first. There is no other rainproof wireless mic for GoPro cameras.

Then we developed our first gimbal for action cameras, the REMOVU S1. The S1 was the world's first rainproof 3-axis gimbal stabilizer with a detachable remote controller. The S1 help put REMOVU on the map and obtained great brand recognition and trust in the community.

Our engineering team has rich experience in developing digital cameras and camcorders for Samsung Electronics. With our knowledge acquired from developing the S1 gimbal, we know that the REMOVU K1 will be a leader in the handheld camera stabilizing market.

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Does REMOVU have any experience in manufacturing cameras?

  • Yes, we were originally a camera engineering team with experiences in developing digital cameras and camcorders for Samsung Electronics. We also developed many action cameras for other brands before we start REMOVU.

Can I mount a smartphone to the K1?​

  • No. However, there is a 1.5-inch LCD on the K1 that allows you to see what the camera sees, as well as it allows you to see and change the camera settings.

Can I mount the K1 to a tripod?

  • Yes. There is a 1/4 inch connection on the bottom of the K1 where you can attach a tripod.

Is the K1 waterproof/rainproof?

  • No. Please avoid exposing your K1 to water or moisture. Any water damage will not be covered by warranty.

What kind of SD card does the K1 support?

  • We recommend UHS-1 class or higher. The maximum size SD card supported is 256GB.

 

K1 App

Can I do firmware upgrades via the app?

  • Yes, this feature will be included in a future version that we will release via Google Play/Apple Store.

Is there a delay while streaming from the camera to the app?

  • Yes, there is a delay of about 0.3 seconds.

 

Smart Battery

How long does it take to charge the battery?

  • About 3 hours.

How do I charge the battery?

  • You can charge the battery via a USB cable or charge it using the K1 cradle that is sold separately.

Is the battery interchangeable?

  • Yes, the battery is interchangeable.

 

Shipping, Tax, and Payments

When will my credit card be charged?

  • Your credit card will be charged immediately after your order is placed.

Do you ship anywhere in the world?

  • No, we do not ship to following destinations: Russia, Ukraine
    We are unable to ship to these countries due to their local customs issues. We are very sorry for this inconvenience.

What are the shipping costs?

  • There is a flat rate of $15 on all K1 orders.

What is your refund policy?

  • We will issue you a full refund if you cancel your order before we ship out your package. Otherwise, you are not eligible for a refund unless it’s covered by the warranty.

Does the price include VAT and other taxes?

  • VAT and/or other duties are not included in the price and may be added in accordance with your local regulations.

story:
Meet the LitraTorch

 *The LitraTorch is Patent Pending.

 

Torch Features and Specifications

 

 

Show Me the Light!

 

Show me the PERKS!

Take a look below to see which perk best fits your lifestyle and lighting activities.  Individual accessories and additional purchase options will be listed in the BackerKit after the campaign is over.

Post Campaign Accessory Add-Ons

In addition to the above perks, when the campaign is over you will receive a survey to confirm your selected perks. At that time you will have the opportunity to purchase additional perks and the below accessories.

The Vision

We set out to create the world's brightest and most versatile, adventure ready LED light. A light that could keep up with unbridled creativity and imagination. A light that would enable amazing moments never before captured in low or no light conditions.

Our mission was to create a:

  • Best in class mobile light for photo and video professionals
  • Best in class light for everyday tasks at home, at work, with a smart phone and for walking and biking
  • Best in class light for outdoor enthusiast and extreme athletes

A key design criteria was to make sure the light could go anywhere a GoPro Session 4 (and now 5) camera can go - literally!

  • Fit into the GoPro Session Frame and GoPro mounting system
  • Match or exceed waterproof and drop test specifications
  • Light beam angle complements camera lens' wide angle
  • Match battery life

We wanted to make the Torch the "Swiss Army Knife" of lights so we designed in:

  • TWO 1/4 20 standard camera mounts to allow for flexible mounting orientations
  • MAGNET built into the body to quickly mount to a car hood, tail gate, pole etc
  • FILTERS for photographic, dive and mood effects = serious photos or serious fun!
  • SOFT LIGHT with a diffusion cap for a lantern like glow
  • QUICK CLIP for a simple and secure way to mount to a belt or backpack

The Journey

Over the past 2 years we have hit all our milestones. We started with defining the MRD (Marketing Requirements Document) and progressed all the way through final design, validation testing and release for tooling.  The major R&D events and expenses are complete.

 

The Torch "Boot Camp" Video

 
Replay with sound
 
Play with
sound
00:00
00:00
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

The Team

Each member has more than 20 years of professional experience in helping bring lifestyle, consumer electronics and lighting products to market for top tier brands. Two years ago Litra endeavored to combine our experience and passion into our own innovative and fun products.
