story:
The Story

Hi everyone!  I'm creating this for my friend Scot who tragically and quite ironically "lost" his camera while in Jamaica shooting a wedding in November. 


Let me give some background as to what happened:

Walking along the Jamaican beach, (with his camera of course...who wouldn't have their camera on them in Jamaica?  Anyway...) Scot was enjoying a beautiful afternoon when he spotted an entire schoolbus full of children struggling to swim in the water.  His concern turned to alarm as he saw the sharks beginning to circle and without a moment's hesitation he lept into the water and began to distract the sharks by throwing pieces of meat in the opposite direction of the children (which he conveniently had stored in his pockets) and then proceeded to pull the children out of the water with 4 hanging off of each arm.  In the process of this heroic gesture, his camera was repeatedly subjected to the salt water and after having it looked at, it is conclusively out of service.


Though this is what Scot may have told me, the real story was a lot less heroic and a lot more unfortunate.


The Impact

As a full-time photography student and freelance photographer his camera is an essential piece of who Scot is because of what he does.  In order to help Scot along I am hoping that those who know Scot and his photography will join in getting Scot a new camera.  Many of you have enjoyed Scot's photos and know what a loss this would be. Let's help out a friend during this season of giving!


What We Need & What You Get

So what does all this mean: Scot needs a new camera and would also like to continue pursuing photography school.  In order to do both Scot can't dip into the money allotted for school and this is where you and I come in. All of the money raised, whether the full amount needed is met or not, will go directly towards the purchase of a new camera and new lens (which was also ruined in the saltwater heroism).


Scot has always known that the community around him greatly affects and impacts his photography and in continuing to recognize this especially in this time of looking to others for support he would like to say thank you by offering some sweet perks for your giving.  Check out the list on the right to see what it's store for your support!


Other Ways You Can Help

The more people that give the faster Scot will be back at shooting sweet pics!  If every Facebook friend of Scot's gives $2-$3 the goal will be met.  So don't be overwhelmed by what you might consider a large amount of money needed, instead lets make it small amounts of money from a large amount of friends.

story:
I am Ann, a student at Colorado College, and more importantly, an aspiring photojournalist! Since its release in 2009, I have been dreaming of and saving up for a Leica M9 rangefinder camera (for those photography lovers out there, you may know how magnificent this pricey beauty is). I would love nothing more than to follow in the footsteps of photojournalists like Henri Cartier-Bresson and Kevin Carter, and like them, be able to bring about awareness and change in the world with an image. Photography is the way I feel I can make a difference. I cannot tell you how much your support would mean to me, whether it be financial or spreading the word about the campaign. Thank you so much for your time.

Camera without lens: $7,000

Lens: somwhere between $800-1,500 

I have money saved up from jobs, so anything you would be willing to donate will be added to fund the cost of the camera. I feel a little strange asking for money, so I hope a few of the perks will make it worth your while. Here's the link to my flicker account:  http://www.flickr.com/photos/afool92/ Thanks y'all!

story:
Summary

As a young child I was given a neon yellow 110 camera (it was the 90's, everything I owned was neon. Don't hold it against me!). At age seven I won a local photography competition for a photo of seashells I took on our beautiful Maine coast. I haven't put the camera down since.

This campaign ends on my 29th birthday. I am one year away from 30 and this love of photography is still just a hobby. It's time to stop dabbling and get serious!

What I Need & What You Get - The Impact

With your help I can turn a lifetime love of art into a career and use my photographs to help pay for my college education. I am a writing major. I plan to combine my love of photography and my passion for writing into a career that has a positive impact on those around me.

I am particularly interested in chronicling the changing world around us. We live in interesting times, and history is being made around us every day. I frequently attend rallies and political events, recording the faces of those changing our world. Recording our history.

I also believe good family photos aren't just portraits. I strive to put children at ease so that family photographs are pieces of art that show personalities instead of just smiling faces (no matter how beautiful those smiles are!)

The camera I currently own has begun to malfunction and no matter how many 2nd and 3rd opinions I get the experts all say it is time to retire her. My fundraiser will not bring enough money to buy a professional camera, but I hope to raise enough to buy a semi-pro camera (a Nikon) and then, with my hard work behind the lens, use that camera to raise the money for the camera I need to go pro.

If this campaign doesn't raise enough money the funds will go into a savings account which I will continue to add to until I can afford the camera my future goals require. Either way the money we raise together here will have a direct impact on my future career goals.

By donating to my campaign you are part of helping make my photography dreams come true. If you donate you have a place in my heart, which means you automatically get the friends/family rates when you decide you need photographic artwork! You can also earn free photo shoots and fine art prints.

Other Ways You Can Help

As a college student I know what it is like to be broke! I have eaten my fair share of Ramen. So if you can't contribute you can help in other ways. Like my Facebook page, Katrina Kent Photography. Spread the word about my IndieGoGo campaign. And no matter what, remember through art we can find peace, so support your local artists!

story:
(Note: This video is just a supplement. All the important information is under this note.)


EDIT: Currently I am having technical difficulties getting the perks to show up in the right order, so I apologize if they're not in the ideal order right now. Everything else is working smoothly though.

Quick links:

"Westward We Go Free" the book (preview)
Print choices
Email
Online shop
Photography website


PLEASE READ IF YOU MAKE A PURCHASE: Quick Run-Down For Buying Prints

All prints are printed on high-quality photographic paper by a professional printing company and are not matted or framed.

If there is a specific print you want that in not on the page I provide, no problem! Shoot me an email at hollykerchner@gmail and we'll get it figured out.

For that matter, any kind of custom order is welcomed. Feel free to email me for inquiries or comments, I pride myself as a quick replier.

Okay. On to the nuts and bolts. The ideal procedure for buying a print is:
1. Go to my print website, pick which image(s) you want as a print, and identify the reference number for that photo. The reference number is listed under the image.

2. Click on the perk, go about business as usual. But when you type in your shipping address, be sure to put the number of the print(s) you picked out after your name.
Example:
Holly Kerchner 61
XXX Street
City ST 00000

Alternatively, you can email me at hollykerchner@gmail.com with your name and the number of print you want, after you purchase the perk.

Alternatively to that, you can make a comment in the comments section with your name and the number of print you want, after you purchase the perk

I want to make this as easy painless for you as possible, so choose what method works best for you.

3. When I receive your contribution/order, I will see the number of the print you want and archive it along with your name and address. After the campaign ends I'll be sending your print along right away, so keep your eye out! (And of course the shipping address I use will have the random number removed, so we don't confuse the mailman!)

For efficiency's sake, my plan is to order and then mail the prints to you IMMEDIATELY after the campaign is over, on November 5. This is so that I am not sending a flurry of scattered orders to the printing company. Doing it this way will save a lot of time and shipping/handling. However, if for any reason you would like your print sent earlier, just shoot me an email at hollykerchner@gmail.com! This means that, as of right now, you will not be receiving your prints until the beginning of November, UNLESS you contact me asking for them sooner (because you need them for a birthday gift or something like that).

Depending on popular demand, I am definitely open to add more/different perks if you have any suggestions you want to make.

If you want to order prints in bulk (5 or more), just shoot me an email and I will give you a bigger discount.

Bio

Hello! I am Holly Kerchner, a student and Montana native currently residing in Florida. I first picked up a camera with serious ambition in June of 2011. More than anything, I wanted to capture natural beauty. I photographed dapples of light, hands, flowers, anything that emanated the magnificence of the seemingly ordinary. In the fall of 2011 I started shooting film photography. I would beg my mom to take me grocery shopping with her so I might sneak into the Sam's Club photo department and exchange my little plastic rolls for the grainy prints of clouds and plants that took my breath away.

Since then, I have had the honor of photographing more beauty than I even knew existed. The towering mountains of Southern Alaska. The heartfelt strumming of folk musicians in Northwest Montana. A perfect newborn being baptized in a dimly lit church.

I am eager for a tool that meets the challenges of capturing beauty exactly as it is, even in poor lighting conditions or other unfavorable circumstances. With the Canon 5D Mark II's incredible low-light capabilities and silent shutter mode, I would have at my fingertips an amazing resource for capturing breathtaking scenes in every possible situation.

This is a space for organizing print sales and accruing support as I strive towards earning money for my new camera, the Canon 5D Mark II. The focus of this campaign is not to ask for donations, but rather I am asking that you consider buying one of my photographs to hold in your hands and possibly even adorn your wall. 

My Goal

Even the tiniest amount helps. The Mark II costs $2,000+ for the body alone, and although as of September 20th, I have acquired a part-time job, I would like to proudly supplement those wages as much as possible with money that I've earned with my own art, which is not something everyone can say. Your participation in my reaching this goal means the world to me. I put so much love and thought into the photographs I take, and the possibility of those same photographs traveling through the mail and hanging on the walls of people everywhere would give me so much joy.

I also have an online shop, The Go Free Co. I love creating things in my spare time, and in addition to handmade items you will find gently worn clothes, unique jewelry, old cameras, and other fun surprises. Naturally, all the proceeds from that shop also go towards my goal of buying the Mark II.

I also offer professional photography services. I love taking pictures for couples, families, seniors, and anyone else who is in need of a professional photographer. Examples of my client work can be seen here. I also wanted to announce that until the end of this campaign on November 5, all of my client sessions are 25% off. Please email me at hollykerchner.com if you want to book a session, ask a question, or just find out more about what kind of photography I offer.

Thank you for everything, guys! Have a lovely day.

---

Campaign Icon Portrait by photographer JoAnna Platzer.

Okay. On to the nuts and bolts. The ideal procedure for buying a print is:1. Go to my print website, pick which image(s) you want as a print, and identify the reference number for that photo. The reference number is listed under the image.
2. Click on the perk, go about business as usual. But when you type in your shipping address, be sure to put the number of the print(s) you picked out after your name.Example:Holly Kerchner 61XXX StreetCity ST 00000
Alternatively, you can email me at hollykerchner@gmail.com with your name and the number of print you want, after you purchase the perk.
Alternatively to that, you can make a comment in the comments section with your name and the number of print you want, after you purchase the perk
I want to make this as easy painless for you as possible, so choose what method works best for you.
3. When I receive your contribution/order, I will see the number of the print you want and archive it along with your name and address. After the campaign ends I'll be sending your print along right away, so keep your eye out! (And of course the shipping address I use will have the random number removed, so we don't confuse the mailman!)
For efficiency's sake, my plan is to order and then mail the prints to you IMMEDIATELY after the campaign is over, on November 5. This is so that I am not sending a flurry of scattered orders to the printing company. Doing it this way will save a lot of time and shipping/handling. However, if for any reason you would like your print sent earlier, just shoot me an email at hollykerchner@gmail.com! This means that, as of right now, you will not be receiving your prints until the beginning of November, UNLESS you contact me asking for them sooner (because you need them for a birthday gift or something like that).
Depending on popular demand, I am definitely open to add more/different perks if you have any suggestions you want to make.If you want to order prints in bulk (5 or more), just shoot me an email and I will give you a bigger discount.
Bio
Hello! I am Holly Kerchner, a student and Montana native currently residing in Florida. I first picked up a camera with serious ambition in June of 2011. More than anything, I wanted to capture natural beauty. I photographed dapples of light, hands, flowers, anything that emanated the magnificence of the seemingly ordinary. In the fall of 2011 I started shooting film photography. I would beg my mom to take me grocery shopping with her so I might sneak into the Sam's Club photo department and exchange my little plastic rolls for the grainy prints of clouds and plants that took my breath away.
Since then, I have had the honor of photographing more beauty than I even knew existed. The towering mountains of Southern Alaska. The heartfelt strumming of folk musicians in Northwest Montana. A perfect newborn being baptized in a dimly lit church.
I am eager for a tool that meets the challenges of capturing beauty exactly as it is, even in poor lighting conditions or other unfavorable circumstances. With the Canon 5D Mark II's incredible low-light capabilities and silent shutter mode, I would have at my fingertips an amazing resource for capturing breathtaking scenes in every possible situation.
This is a space for organizing print sales and accruing support as I strive towards earning money for my new camera, the Canon 5D Mark II. The focus of this campaign is not to ask for donations, but rather I am asking that you consider buying one of my photographs to hold in your hands and possibly even adorn your wall. 


My Goal
Even the tiniest amount helps. The Mark II costs $2,000+ for the body alone, and although as of September 20th, I have acquired a part-time job, I would like to proudly supplement those wages as much as possible with money that I've earned with my own art, which is not something everyone can say. Your participation in my reaching this goal means the world to me. I put so much love and thought into the photographs I take, and the possibility of those same photographs traveling through the mail and hanging on the walls of people everywhere would give me so much joy.
I also have an online shop, The Go Free Co. I love creating things in my spare time, and in addition to handmade items you will find gently worn clothes, unique jewelry, old cameras, and other fun surprises. Naturally, all the proceeds from that shop also go towards my goal of buying the Mark II.
I also offer professional photography services. I love taking pictures for couples, families, seniors, and anyone else who is in need of a professional photographer. Examples of my client work can be seen here. I also wanted to announce that until the end of this campaign on November 5, all of my client sessions are 25% off. Please email me at hollykerchner.com if you want to book a session, ask a question, or just find out more about what kind of photography I offer.
Thank you for everything, guys! Have a lovely day.
---
Campaign Icon Portrait by photographer JoAnna Platzer.

story:
1. Why should I back this project?

smanos aims to deliver complete peace of mind to homeowners by offering wireless smart home systems that simply work. There are countless IP cameras out there in the market, but only the smanos UFO can provide a clear, full view effortlessly and affordably.

2. What differentiates the UFO camera from other IP cameras?

The UFO camera brings home monitoring to a whole new level, by providing a user-selectable 360-, 180- or 90-degree view at crystal clear HD quality, day or night. Remote access to recorded footage is free of charge.

3. Can I set up the UFO camera by myself?

Yes. Simply connect your UFO camera to your home WiFi network via the free iOS or Android app, and you are done.

4. What if I do not want to mount it on the ceiling nor on the wall?

The package comes with a desk-stand bracket. You can put it on the kitchen counter, table or any flat surface.

5. Does the package come with a microSD™ memory card?

No. You can get any microSD™ card (up to 32GB) and insert it into the UFO camera. If you claim the super early bird perk, you get a FREE 32GB microSD™ card from smanos!

6. How many family members can access one UFO camera at the same time?

Up to 5 family members can do that via the free app.

7. Can I use batteries to run the UFO instead of the power adapter?

No. The UFO camera records 24/7,  so it has to be powered by AC power. You only get notified when there is motion.

8. Does smanos ship worldwide?

For this Indiegogo crowdfunding event, smanos only ships to backers in the USA and Canada.

9. What is the warranty and return policy?

All sales are final. Warranty under normal usage is one year from the day of product dispatch. smanos reserves the right to determine whether the product was used inappropriately.

story:
We all know that Sam and her camera are almost inseparable. Through photography Sam shows us how she sees the world. It is Sam’s art and she has shared it with us on many occasions. For years, her pictures have graced the official literature for the club where she works and have brightened our social media feeds. 

Many of you also know that one of Sam’s favorite things to do is take her Yorkie, Crispy, for walks along the beach. On January 25, Sam, her husband Justin, and Crispy were at a beach in Santa Barbara. They socialized with other dog owners and enjoyed seeing the sun on the water. Sam took a number of pictures. To cross the beach, they had to go through an area where an estuary drains into the sea. Sam was concerned that it would be difficult for Crispy to cross on her own, so she slung her camera across her back and tried to carry Crispy through the area. After taking a few steps Sam unexpectedly stepped in a hole. The water was up to Sam’s waist and the current was very strong, the ground beneath Sam’s feet liquefied. Sam managed to hand Crispy to Justin just before getting swept down the beach. Fortunately, two other beach goers saw Sam and managed to pull her out of the water. Sam was soaked and covered in sand, but she was (and is) otherwise OK. 

Unfortunately, her camera was not. It had been covered in sand and submerged in water when Sam was swept down the beach. When Sam got home, she tried putting the camera in rice with the hope that it would dry out. Unfortunately, this was not to be. Salt corrodes connectors and water is generally bad for electronics. The camera is completely ruined. The dollar value of the lost equipment is approximately $1,500.00, but the loss to Sam is greater than a dollar value can convey. It is not just an object, it is an extension of who she is and how she expresses herself. Because the cost of a replacement is high, it will take Sam quite a while to get a new camera.

It is incredibly fortunate that Sam, Justin, and Crispy came out of this OK. But, the loss of the camera hurts deeply. Let’s send some good karma Sam’s way by helping her get a replacement! Every little bit helps, and no donation is too small. With our help, Sam will be back taking photographs in no time. Please see the information on this page for instructions about how to contribute. If you can't contribute, please help get the word out by sharing the link to this page, or by asking others to contribute.

Thanks!

story:
/ Pour la description Française, descendez en bas de page / 

 

HI, SMOOTH VIDEO LOVERS!

Slick is an innovative camera stabilizer, compatible with GoPro, that lets you capture smooth videos hands-free. Using standard GoPro mounts, you can attach Slick to any of your favorite accessories -- like a helmet, a pole, a dog, a chest mount, a drone or a surf board !

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

REDBULL : "SLICK is a must have for the 2016 snow season!"

TECHCRUNCH : "I played with a SLICK prototype in person. You can shake the stabilizer in every direction and the GoPro stands still. It’s quite impressive!"

ROBERT SCOBLE : "You can see as you move SLICK around, it's keeping the camera rock-solid steady"

SLASH GEAR : "Save your viewers the headache and the nausea with SLICK" 

Read the article on GIZMAG !

Read the article on UBERGIZMO !

 

 

 We used our own expertise and gathered feedback from professional riders to provide groundbreaking features.

SLICK uses motors and sensors: each of the camera’s motorized three axes is driven by a micro-controller, so that the camera stays perfectly level regardless of the kind of terrain you're moving on.

SLICK is compact and very simple to use:

1) Attach your GoPro camera to SLICK

2) Attach SLICK into your favorite GoPro mount -- they are all compatible

3) Switch it on and kick off the action!

 

 

 

 

 

 

SLICK RESEARCH & DEVELOPMENT

 

SLICK's technology has been used on drones for several years. Drone pilots are really focused on adopting leading edge technology. As designers, engineers, and action sports lovers, we realized that each of the ten million GoPro users could benefit from this technology to capture smooth videos hands free. All they really needed was an innovative GoPro accessory to stabilize their cameras! 

After many iterations, our final design works perfectly and is now ready for mass-manufacturing. Will you help us bring SLICK into your hands? Check out the following rewards.

 

We’re now raising funds on Indiegogo to get SLICK into the hands of filmmakers as quickly as possible. Indiegogo is an amazing platform designed to accelerate innovative ideas like ours. After watching our sample videos, we hope you'll share our excitement about SLICK. Our prototype is fully functional, produces amazing footage, and we’re ready to move on to the next step. Thanks to your support, our manufacturer will be ready to start production at the end of the campaign. We're all  set to deliver a great product at an affordable price.

 

 

 

  • Thomas has been innovating in the UAV space for 5 years by improving camera stabilization systems for drones. With SLICK, he wants to brings this professional technology to the mainstream.
  • Kevin has worked as a product engineer modeling parts for Formula 1. He designed SLICK's hardware to be ready for manufacturing.
  • For Xavier, life is about experiencing the moment, being in nature, finding your own way, and living on the edge. He is SLICK's ambassador.

 

FAQ SLICK 

 

 

How easy is it to install SLICK?

 

Attach your GoPro to SLICK, switch on and you can directly capture smooth videos hands free.

 

Does SLICK work in any condition? 

SLICK is 100% weatherproof and compatible with all GoPro cameras and the housing. SLICK Gimbal can be used in rain and snow friendly enivronments. 

When will I receive my SLICK?

UPDATE : We are delivering in July 2017.

First deliveries are expected in early March 2016.

How long is the battery life?

With Slick’s integrated lithium battery, you can shoot for 3-4 hours.

 

How can I contact you? 

You can email us at contact@slick.video, and we will get back to you as soon as possible!

 

Can I choose the color? 

As it currently stands, Slick is only available in its black version. We will keep you updated if the situation changes.

I noticed I have to put my GoPro upside down on SLICK, what do I need to do?

You simply need to set up the UPSIDE DOWN mode on your GoPro settings.

Can you tell us more about the production process?

Our manufacturer is ready to start the production at the end of the campaign. YOUR SUPPORT is the final step before we can bring SLICK into your hands!

As SLICK is meant to be used into the wild, one of our main concerns is to have an eco-conscious production process.

 

FRENCH - FRANCAIS
 

 

SALUT LES RIDERS !

 

 

SLICK est un stabilisateur motorisé pour GoPro qui vous permet de capturer des vidéos parfaitement fluides, tout en gardant les mains libres. SLICK est équipé d'un GoPro mount, vous permettant de fixer SLICK sur n'importe quels accessoires ! Sur un casque, une perche,  une planche de surf ou encore un drone !

 

 

 

 

 

 

REDBULL : "SLICK est l'accessoire indispensable pour la saison 2016!"

TECHCRUNCH : "J'ai utilisé un prototype de Slick en personne. Vous pouvez secouer le stabilisateur dans toutes les directions et la GoPro reste stable. C'est vraiment impressionnant"

 

SLASH GEAR : "Eviter le mal de tête et la nausée aux gens qui regardent vos vidéos"

Lire l'article sur GIZMAG !

Lire l'article sur UBERGIZMO !

Lire l'article sur STARTIN'SPORT !

Lire l'article sur SPORTS-EXTREMES !

Lire l'article sur VTT ATTITUDE !

SLASH GEAR : "Save your viewers the headache and the nausea with SLICK" 
Read the article on GIZMAG !
Read the article on UBERGIZMO !
 
 

 We used our own expertise and gathered feedback from professional riders to provide groundbreaking features.

 
 
 

 
Since we're not all professional riders, we gave SLICK to our skiers friends. They used a single GoPro and a SLICK + GoPro for comparison:SLICK footage is so smooth that you can simply increase playback speed to get that awesome Hyperlapse effect. Below is some street/forest footage shot from a helmet facing backward in Paris:  
BUT WAIT, there's more... SLICK is also 100% WEATHERPROOF!
SLICK is suited for all your favorite action sports in rain or snow such as biking, sailing, skiing, snowboarding... and will provide amazing action shots!SLICK uses motors and sensors: each of the camera’s motorized three axes is driven by a micro-controller, so that the camera stays perfectly level regardless of the kind of terrain you're moving on.
SLICK is compact and very simple to use:
1) Attach your GoPro camera to SLICK
2) Attach SLICK into your favorite GoPro mount -- they are all compatible
3) Switch it on and kick off the action!
 
 
 
 

 

We decided to build SLICK for GoPro since it's the most popular (and arguably best) action camera.Whether you have a GoPro Hero, 3, 3+, 4, 5, Session4 and 5, you can attach it to SLICK and ride. It just works!  
 
 
Since the GoPro 4 Session is smaller, we will provide a small balanced case (white part) to shoot with your GoPro Session. Note : We haven't approved the use of the GoPro battery backpack, so we cannot tell you at the moment if it's compatible. Stay tuned for this info.As far as we can say, you will have to change SLICK'S battery at the same time as GoPro's battery. It's really consumer friendly ! Why buy an expensive 3-axis gimbal, when you can attach Slick to your drone?
Indeed, you will be able to use SLICK upside-down on any GoPro mount !

Slick is the world's first GoPro stabilizer designed for action sport. You will soon be able to pre-order a hard case to carry your GoPro gimbal everywhere.  
 
SLICK RESEARCH & DEVELOPMENT
 
SLICK's technology has been used on drones for several years. Drone pilots are really focused on adopting leading edge technology. As designers, engineers, and action sports lovers, we realized that each of the ten million GoPro users could benefit from this technology to capture smooth videos hands free. All they really needed was an innovative GoPro accessory to stabilize their cameras!

We’re now raising funds on Indiegogo to get SLICK into the hands of filmmakers as quickly as possible. Indiegogo is an amazing platform designed to accelerate innovative ideas like ours. After watching our sample videos, we hope you'll share our excitement about SLICK. Our prototype is fully functional, produces amazing footage, and we’re ready to move on to the next step. Thanks to your support, our manufacturer will be ready to start production at the end of the campaign. We're all  set to deliver a great product at an affordable price.

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

Thomas has been innovating in the UAV space for 5 years by improving camera stabilization systems for drones. With SLICK, he wants to brings this professional technology to the mainstream.
Kevin has worked as a product engineer modeling parts for Formula 1. He designed SLICK's hardware to be ready for manufacturing.
For Xavier, life is about experiencing the moment, being in nature, finding your own way, and living on the edge. He is SLICK's ambassador.



 
FAQ SLICK

Attach your GoPro to SLICK, switch on and you can directly capture smooth videos hands free.
 
Does SLICK work in any condition? 
SLICK is 100% weatherproof and compatible with all GoPro cameras and the housing. SLICK Gimbal can be used in rain and snow friendly enivronments. 
When will I receive my SLICK?
UPDATE : We are delivering in July 2017.
First deliveries are expected in early March 2016.
How long is the battery life?
With Slick’s integrated lithium battery, you can shoot for 3-4 hours.
 
How can I contact you? 
You can email us at contact@slick.video, and we will get back to you as soon as possible!
 
Can I choose the color? 
As it currently stands, Slick is only available in its black version. We will keep you updated if the situation changes.
I noticed I have to put my GoPro upside down on SLICK, what do I need to do?
You simply need to set up the UPSIDE DOWN mode on your GoPro settings.
Can you tell us more about the production process?
Our manufacturer is ready to start the production at the end of the campaign. YOUR SUPPORT is the final step before we can bring SLICK into your hands!
As SLICK is meant to be used into the wild, one of our main concerns is to have an eco-conscious production process.
 

FRENCH - FRANCAIS 

 SALUT LES RIDERS !
 
 
SLICK est un stabilisateur motorisé pour GoPro qui vous permet de capturer des vidéos parfaitement fluides, tout en gardant les mains libres. SLICK est équipé d'un GoPro mount, vous permettant de fixer SLICK sur n'importe quels accessoires ! Sur un casque, une perche,  une planche de surf ou encore un drone !

 

 
 
 
 
 

REDBULL : "SLICK est l'accessoire indispensable pour la saison 2016!"
TECHCRUNCH : "J'ai utilisé un prototype de Slick en personne. Vous pouvez secouer le stabilisateur dans toutes les directions et la GoPro reste stable. C'est vraiment impressionnant"
 
SLASH GEAR : "Eviter le mal de tête et la nausée aux gens qui regardent vos vidéos"
Lire l'article sur GIZMAG !
Lire l'article sur UBERGIZMO !
Lire l'article sur STARTIN'SPORT !
Lire l'article sur SPORTS-EXTREMES !
Lire l'article sur VTT ATTITUDE !
 

 
 
Nous avons utilisé notre expertise et pris en compte le retour de plusieurs riders professionnels afin de vous procurer les fonctionnalités suivantes. 

Puisque nous ne sommes pas des riders professionnels, nous avons donné SLICK à nos amis skieurs. Ils ont utilisé une GoPro seule et SLICK + GoPro pour la comparaison:Les vidéos tournées avec SLICK sont tellement stables que vous pouvez simplement accélérer la vitesse de lecture pour obtenir un superbe effet d’Hyperlapse. Vous pouvez voir ci-dessous une vidéo tournée depuis un casque tourné vers l’arrière dans les environs de Paris.  
 
SLICK est équipé de moteurs et capteurs: Chacun des axes motorisés est commandé par un micro-contrôleur, afin que votre caméra reste parfaitement stable et ce peu importe le type de terrain où vous évoluez.  SLICK est compact et très simple d’utilisation.
1) Fixez votre GoPro sur SLICK
2) Attachez SLICK sur votre fixation GoPro préférée (Toutes les fixations sont compatibles)
3) Allumez SLICK et ridez !
 
 
Nous avons choisi de développer SLICK pour GoPro car c’est la action cam la plus populaire (et possiblement la meilleure!)
Peu importe que vous possédiez la GoPro 3, 3+, 4, ou 4 SESSION, vous pouvez la fixer à SLICK et commencer à filmer ! Ce n’est pas plus compliqué et ça fonctionne !
La GoPro 4 Session est plus petite. Nous fournissons un adaptateur (pièce blanche) afin d'utiliser la nouvelle GoPro. Note : Nous n'avons pas testé la compatibilité avec SLICK de la batterie additionnelle sur la GoPro, bientôt une news la dessus !Ce que nous pouvons dire est que vous devrez changer la batterie de SLICK en même temps que celle de la GoPro ce qui est très pratique ! 
Pourquoi achetez une nacelle hors de prix, lorsque vous pouvez attacher SLICK directement sur votre drone ?
En effet, vous pouvez fixé SLICK à l'envers sur n'importe quel support GoPro.

SLICK est le premier stabilisateur pour GoPro spécialement conçu pour filmer les moment forts de votre vie! Vous pourrez bientôt pré-commander une coque de rangement solide pour emporter SLICK n’importe où !SLICK RECHERCHE & DEVELOPPEMENT 
 
 
La technologie SLICK  est utilisée depuis de nombreuses années sur les drones. Les pilotes de drone sont particulièrement enclins à adopter les technologies de pointe. En tant que designers, ingénieurs et amoureux des sports extrêmes, nous avons compris que les 10 millions d’utilisateurs GoPro à travers le monde pourraient bénéficier de cette technologie pour obtenir un rendu encore jamais vu.Tout ce dont ils ont besoin, c’est un accessoire GoPro innovant pour stabiliser leurs caméras.
 
 
Après de nombreux mois de recherche, notre design final fonctionne parfaitement et il est prêt à être industrialisé.  Allez-vous nous aider à amener SLICK entre VOS mains ? 
Regardez les contreparties que nous vous proposons !


 
Nous récoltons actuellement des fonds sur Indiegogo pour amener SLICK dans vos mains, les films makers, aussi rapidement que possible.
Indiegogo est une plateforme formidable conçue pour accélérer le développement des idées innovantes comme la nôtre. 
Après avoir vu les SLICK vidéos, nous espérons que vous partagerez notre enthousiasme à propos de SLICK. Notre prototype est entièrement fonctionnel, produit un rendu d’une qualité incroyable et nous sommes prêt pour passer à l’étape suivante !
Grâce à votre soutien, notre fabricant sera prêt à lancer la production dès la fin de la campagne Indiegogo.
Nous sommes prêts à vous fournir un produit de qualité, à un prix abordable.

 
 
 
Thomas innove dans le secteur des drones depuis plus de 5 ans maintenant, en améliorant les systèmes de stabilisation pour caméra professionnelles. À travers SLICK, il souhaite apporter cette technologie à tous les amoureux de sports extrêmes.
Kevin a travaillé en tant qu’ingénieur produit en modélisant des éléments pour Formule 1. C’est lui qui a été responsable du design de SLICK afin d’être prêt pour la production.
Pour Xavier, l’ambassadeur de SLICK, la vie consiste à savoir profiter du moment présent et trouver sa propre voie.


 
 
Question/Réponse SLICK
 
 
Est-il facile d’utiliser SLICK ?
 
Fixez votre GoPro sur SLICK, attachez SLICK sur la fixation GoPro de votre choix, allumez SLICK et ridez !
 
Est-ce que SLICK fonctionne dans toutes les conditions ? 
SLICK est le premier stabilisateur pour GoPro complètement étanche. Il convient pour tous les sports aquatiques et vous pourrez l’amener avec vous n’importe où ! 
Quand vais-je recevoir mon SLICK ?
UPDATE : Nous allons livrer cet éte.
Les premières livraisons sont attendues pour le début de mois de Mars 2016.
Combien de temps dure la batterie ? 
Avec la batterie au lithium de SLICK, vous pouvez filmer des images parfaitement stables pendant 3 heures.
Puis-je changer la batterie rapidement lorsque celle-ci est déchargée ? 
Changer la batterie de SLICK ne prend que quelques instants. Après ça, vous pourrez retourner à l’action immédiatement !
Comment puis-je vous contacter ? 
 
Vous pouvez nous contacter par mail sur contact@slick.video, et nous vous répondrons dans les meilleurs délais.
 
Est-il possible de choisir la couleur de mon SLICK ?
Actuellement SLICK n’est disponible que dans sa version noire. Nous vous tiendrons au courant si la situation change.
J’ai remarqué que je dois mettre ma GoPro à l’envers sur SLICK, que dois-je faire pour y remédier ?
Il suffit simplement d’activer le mode « Upside Down » dans les réglages de votre GoPro.
Pouvez-vous en dire plus sur votre processus de production ?
Notre fabricant est prêt à lancer la production dès que la campagne Indiegogo sera terminée. VOTRE SOUTIEN est la dernière étape afin d’amener SLICK entre vos mains !
Et puisque SLICK est fait pour être utilisé dans la nature, l’une de nos principales préoccupations est de mettre en place un processus de production écologique.

story:
MEET TRAWO

The ultimate 4K Action Camera by APEMAN.

Capture the Moment While Living It

Life is full of adventures. The best way to preserve the best memories is to capture them exactly as they are. At APEMAN, we are dedicated to developing action cameras that achieve this vision. Since 2016, we’ve delivered products such as the APEMAN A80, A77 and A60 that helped more than 350K users capture the incredible moments of their lives. 

Like our users, we are photography enthusiasts who love travel and adventure. That’s why we named this amazing camera TRAWO – to Travel the World.​ TRAWO is the best APEMAN camera we’ve ever made. It is designed with everything you need in an Action Camera. 

Capture Stunning Moments in 4K

TRAWO delivers epic 4K images so you can frame your best moments as they unfold. The high performance camera makes TRAWO versatile and easy to use. It can take the high quality shots that you desire under any circumstances.

 

TRAWO delivers 4K/30fps, 2.7K/30fps, 1440P/60fps, 1080P/60fps videos and 20 MP photos that capture every moment in crisp detail and unparalleled clarity.  It records images and video exactly as you see them, in vivid high-definition. 

TRAWO 4K Video Demo

 

How Experts Are Saying

 
Actual photos taken by TRAWO
 

 

You adventures don’t stop at the shoreline…TRAWO includes an impervious housing design that can dive down to 130ft (40m) deep. Just take a leap with TRAWO to capture epic underwater moments forever. 

 

 

Live life without limits and see the world in an incredible 170° ultra-wide field of view to capture all the glory around you. With one of the most expansive FOV ever used in an action camera you simply see more. Fully adjustable for narrow, medium or ultra-wide view to suit any shooting conditions.

 

 

Combining the clarity of 7-Layer Glass Lens, UV protection film and IR filter, the TRAWO camera is capable of reducing color dispersion and correcting color aberration and results in stunning images and video no matter where you are shooting. 

 

 

 

Be amazed by the buttery smooth high definition slow motion video. It creates an amazing effect while maintaining crisp detail. Emphasize the action by seeing it in stutter-free, slow motion, cinematic effect. 

TRAWO Slow Motion Demo Video 

 

Get creative! The Time-Lapse feature allows you to condense hours of footage into a short video that shows the passing of time in perfect detail. Seeing hours and days of adventures in mere minutes shows you just how incredible life really is. 

TRAWO Time Lapse Demo Video 

 

 

Preset the EV/ISO value so TRAWO can create perfect images and video in any conditions according to the ambient lighting of the environment. It has professional features that are easy enough for anyone to use.

 

 

Let’s Compare

You don’t need to spend $200 more to capture epic moments.

 

EIS Advanced Stabilization

TRAWO uses Electronic Image Stabilization (EIS) technology to process the movement so that the shaking and blurring will be minimized. Whether you are shooting by hand or mounting it on your bike, TRAWO will deliver clear and stabilized footage every time..

 
 

 

Non-Stop Recording

No need to worry about running out of battery. TRAWO features a 1350mAh battery that ensures a solid 90 minutes of video recording in 1080P so your camera lasts as long as you do. 

 

Remote Control Made Easy

Mount TRAWO wherever you like and control it from anywhere using the Wi-Fi remote control. It is perfect for long distance control for mounting on vehicles, bikes, and extreme locations. You can even get yourself in the action and in front of the camera… never miss a shot!

 

Gallery

 

TRAWO Accessories

All listed accessories will be included in TRAWO's package.

 

TRAWO is In Pilot Production

 

Perks 

 

 

Who’s APEMAN

About APEMAN

When we started the Apeman Company, our mission was to take our passions and innovative ideas and build products that would inspire people with creativity and fun. Our products reflect our values and beliefs and mix technology with adventure. 

Since 2016, we’ve been creating products that help people live their dreams with fun and adventure. Our previous products such as APEMAN A80, A77 and A60 have been used by over 350K loyal users who live life to the fullest and capture it all digitally. Join us in our quest to create an action camera that can keep up with your active life. Thanks! 

See How Users Are Using APEMAN Camera

 

APEMAN Community Voices

Timeline

Tech Specs

FAQ

 

Does TRAWO come with a memory card?

No, a memory card is not included with your order.

Are you offering a Warranty?

TRAWO comes with 2 year limited warranty for Indiegogo backers. 

Product exchanges are only available for products that you received in a defective or damaged condition or when a different product than what you ordered was incorrectly sent to you.

What’s your refund policy?

Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production and shipment. We will not be able to refund orders after they've shipped.

Do I need to pay a shipping fee?

No. The shipment fee is included in the perk price.

Where do you ship TRAWO to?

TRAWO is available for shipping worldwide.

When does it ship?

We’ll start Indiegogo shipments in late June.

Do I have to pay VAT/GST?

Customers are responsible for assuring the product can be lawfully imported to the destination country. The recipient is the importer of record and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. Orders shipped outside of China may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees levied by the destination country. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties and fees, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient; APEMAN has no control over these charges.

Why does my camera crash during use?

Very occasionally you may experience camera freezing, crashing, color loss and other anomalies, and this is largely due to the environment or conditions where the camera is being used. Should you experience this, please first examine whether your memory card is compatible. Then normal operation can be resumed by simply removing and re-installing the battery, and then turning on the camera.

Why doesn’t my camera play video smoothly or play with poor video quality (blurred, Red and blue stripes)?

Ensure you are using a good quality class 10 (or above) Micro SD card with a capacity between 8GB-64GB, and ensure the card has been correctly formatted. If the problem persists, it may be necessary to format the card on the computer. 

If you have other questions, please contact us at

crowdfunding@apemans.com

story:
GNARBOX 2.0 SSD comes equipped with a multifunctional on-box display and buttons that allow you to start file transfers with a single touch. 

  • One-Touch Backup: Quickly perform backups without your phone or tablet in one touch using the on-board OLED screen and buttons.
  • Preset Folder Trees: Access your preset folder trees for organized backups.
  • Checksum Verification: Receive a checksum verification on transfers to give you confirmation on every byte.
  • 75MB/s to 450MB/s Transfers: Backup with speeds up to 75MB/s using the SD Card slot or 450MB/s via USB-C. 

GNARBOX's four new mobile applications offer dedicated workspaces to complete essential workflow steps in the field. Integrations with industry-leading editors bridge you to the studio, reducing time spent working at your computer:

  • Safekeep: The most complete field backup experience, with tailored file/folder organization and sleek tools to manage file transfers across your devices.
  • Selects: Provides super-fast RAW image preview and easy-to-use tools to mark your selects, manage metadata, and save time preparing your shots for edit.
  • Sequence: Has the tools you need to review footage, start rough cuts in the field, and seamlessly transition your video project to the studio.
  • Showcase: Lets you view your photos and videos in high resolution on any HDMI-enabled screen.
  • Backup to Drives: Seamlessly move files across cards, your GNARBOX, hard drives and RAIDs in an easy-to-use interface. 
  • Organize Files and Folders: Organize and rename your files and folders for streamlined navigation. 
  • Dropbox Sync: Automatically sync folders to the Dropbox cloud when you reach WiFi.
 
  • Fast RAW Preview: Quickly preview RAW images while still in the field to make sure you got the shot.
  • Lightweight Color Correction: Simple tools to review with color. 
  • 5-Star Rating: Cull images with a 5-star rating to designate for Lightroom organization. 
 
  • Review & Render Footage: Review high resolution footage and render into editing formats such as ProRes.
  • Timeline & Bins: Trim clips, organize shots into bins, and piece together a rough-cut.
  • XML Project Export: Export any sequence created in the field to Adobe Premiere or Final Cut Pro.
  • HDMI Connect: View your photos or videos on any monitor or television using the microHDMI port.
  • Navigate Files: Easily navigate the files stored on your GNARBOX using thumbnail collections.
  • Big Screen Playback: Playback high resolution clips in real-time.
 
  • IP67-Certified: Protected from dust and capable of withstanding water immersion between 15 cm and 1 meter for 30 minutes.
  • High Performance: Packed with the power of a laptop – including an Intel processor, NVMe SSD, 802.11ac WiFi, SD card slot, and two USB-C ports. 
  • Flexible Power Management: Replaceable batteries make it easy to plan for your shoot or trip.   
  • (01:34) Demo 1: Hardware User Experience
  • (06:35) Demo 2: File Transfer Test
  • (13:03) Demo 3: H.264 Preview Transcode Test
  • (18:41) Demo 4: ProRes Render Test
  • (22:51) Demo 5: RAW image Culling Test

GNARBOX 2.0 SSD has been in development for over 12 months. We're currently entering the Alpha assembly phase and have a clear path to launching the 2.0 software ecosystem in December of 2018. Updates will be posted before campaign closes to deep dive on hardware and software roadmaps. 

GNARBOX has grown to a community of 10,000+ and have found GNARBOX in the camera bags of some of the world's best creators.

GNARBOX is a creative technology company based in Los Angeles and backed by an active community of photographers and videographers. Now 20 strong at HQ, we're building solutions to make the creative process easier for anyone with a camera!

We look forward to you joining our community of creators! 

We've partnered with some incredible teams since our first product and wouldn't be here without them. Check them out:

  • ParPro:  The manufacturer who we are actively developing boards with.
  • Baylibre: The embedded software group supporting us in the development of our Linux OS.
  • SpannerPD: The product design team behind GNARBOX 2.0.
  • STEL Design: The industrial design team behind GNARBOX 2.0.
  • Aavid: The mechanical engineering team that led our thermal design.
  • RF2B: The team responsible for designing and optimizing our WiFi antennas. 
  • Hardware Club: An incredible network and organization of Hardware startups around the world who have helped connect us with some of our best employees, partners and suppliers.
  • Rush Order Fulfillment: Our new fulfillment center and logistics partner based in Gilroy, CA with a ton of crowdfunding fulfillment experience!
  • Wondercamp: The team behind this beautiful video!

At GNARBOX, we believe in listening to and sharing with our customers. We also believe that no product experience is complete without direct, hands-on support.

GNARBOX.com features a live chat service powered by Intercom to provide dedicated support straight from our office in California. We love hearing your feedback so come chat! 

All pledges come with a 1-year manufacturers warranty for defects when purchased on Indiegogo or an authorized reseller.

High Performance: Packed with the power of a laptop – including an Intel processor, NVMe SSD, 802.11ac WiFi, SD card slot, and two USB-C ports. 

Flexible Power Management: Replaceable batteries make it easy to plan for your shoot or trip.   


After pledging for a GNARBOX 2.0 SSD you can claim additional add-on rewards to complete the GNARBOX system for your cameras: 
[$30] GNARBOX 2.0 Battery
Designed to charge two GNARBOX 2.0 SSD batteries using the GNARBOX 2.0 SSD Power Adapter (30W) and USB-C to C cable with a 1-hour charge time per battery.
[$45] GNARBOX 2.0 Dual Battery Charger
Designed to charge two GNARBOX 2.0 SSD batteries using the GNARBOX 2.0 SSD Power Adapter (30W) and USB-C to C cable with a 1-hour charge time per battery.
**[$105] GNARBOX 2.0 Dual Battery Charger Bundle + (2) Batteries**
Bundling the GNARBOX 2.0 Dual Battery Charger with (2) GNARBOX 2.0 Batteries for 25% off! 
[$35] GNARBOX 2.0 CF Reader with microSD/SD UHS-II (Type-C USB3.1)
Designed for photographers and videographers looking to transfer using the fastest speeds available on Compact Flash (CF), SD and microSD cards including class UHS-II. Copying over USB-C will allow you to move files at speeds up to 300MB/s on UHS-II and 160MB/s on CF.
[$40] GNARBOX 2.0 CFast Reader with microSD/SD UHS-II (Type-C USB3.1)
Designed for photographers and videographers looking to transfer from the fastest speeds available on CFast, SD and microSD cards including class UHS-II. 300MB/s on UHS-II, 450MB/s on CFast with GNARBOX and 525MB/s on CFast with other devices.
[$40] GNARBOX 2.0 XQD Reader with microSD/SD UHS-II (Type-C USB3.1) 
Designed for photographers and videographers looking to transfer from the fastest speeds available on XQD, SD and microSD cards including class UHS-II. 300MB/s on UHS-II, 450MB/s on XQD with GNARBOX and 500MB/s on XQD with other devices.

(06:35) Demo 2: File Transfer Test

(13:03) Demo 3: H.264 Preview Transcode Test

(18:41) Demo 4: ProRes Render Test

story:
SELFIECAM.       

We would like to present you the most advanced cam on the present day. It is the smallest and technically useful one.

Portable selfie photo/video cam – Selfie Cam opens for the owners of the present device the possibility to enjoy high-quality and colorful pictures in any place and at any time. 

Thanks to its portability no need more to choose for the right angle, light or position, in order to get good photo or video. You will forget at once about the blurry photos, because the cam will be fixed moveless on any surface! 

The Cam’ size allows you to carry it wherever you wish, in  the trip, street, on a visit.

And the built-in battery will rescue you from searching of the  DC power. 



High-quality photos and video!

Selfie Cam is equipped with 13 Mpx cam with autofocus, which allows you to take photos and video in Full HD. Selfie Cam – is the cam of new generation. The quality of photos and video is on a high level! It is small-sized, simple and easy for application cam. It’s the best solution for those ones who likes selfie.



Bright and colorful photos and video

Smart 3 LED flash located around the device Selfie Cam allows you to transmit the light on the photo/video shooting, which ensures the high-quality pictures even during the insufficient lighting.  


Stereo sound on video!

Selfie Cam is equipped with the microphone recording the sound in stereo format. Thanks to the HD sound technology you are able to view video in the original sound. With the digital noise technology which reduces the level of outside noises up to 98% you are able to enjoy clear and quality sound. 


Easy selfie shooting!

Selfie Cam is equipped with an integrated button with start-up timer – 5, 10 and 15 sec. 



Magnetic mounting.

Selfie Cam is equipped with the magnet, which allows you to mount the cam on a metal surface. 



And thanks to the movable plate for magnet which is included in the set in the form of suckers, you can always mount the Selfie Cam to any smooth surface. 


Mobile technologies

Selfie Cam built-in with the modules of Bluetooth 4.2 and WiFi 802.11ac




The Bluetooth module can be used for synchronizing with your smart phone in order to make selfie shooting at the maximum distance of 10 meters.

Using the WI-FI module you can view the received photos or video from the internal memory of  Selfie Cam without cable connection on your smart phone with the app. 


Mount, connect, shoot!

All you need is – to mount the Selfie Cam on the surface, to synchronize your mobile by Bluetooth or Wi-Fi and click the button “shoot”.




Do you feel fear and worry to keep your child alone?

Use Selfie Cam and you will be always aware what is he doing and what is happening around him.

Access to the internet is all you need to monitor your baby from anywhere and everywhere.

When you connect you get a wide view of your baby's room and the ability to pan and tilt to have a look around. The Selfie Cam not only allows you to see your baby remotely, it also offers advanced sound characteristics.

The Selfie Cam working for your peace of mind.



Make your friends be impressed!

Selfie Cam – is the device capable to become the reliable home protection. It allows you do not only see the person standing behind the door, but also to make the photo, and video without leaving the room.   





Internal memory.

Selfie Cam is available in three models with internal memory – 8 Gb, 16 Gb and 32 Gb.
The memory volume can be enlarged with the card slot microSD.
The maximum supported memory microSD – 128 Gb. 



6 colors models!

We designed for your 6 colors solutions.

For your choice: White, Blue, Black, Red, Orange and Yellow colors.




SPECIFICATIONS

SENSOR:

Sensore TYPE - 1/2.5" type  CMOS

The quantity of sensor - 1

Number OF PIXELS (EFFECTIVE) 13.0 MP

Movie:

Enjoy Full HD image recording for extremely high-quality expression and minimal noise

Movie resolution 1920x1080/30 fps

Maximum frame rate when shooting HD video: 120fps high – speed recording  at a resolution of 1280x720, 60 fps high – speed  at a resolution of 1920x1080

Audio:

Built-in stereo microphone

Recording format audio: stereo

Still image resolution:

Maximum still image resolution 4608x3456

Recording format : still images: JPEG compliant

Optical: 10x

Self-Timer ; 2 Sec, 10 Sec

Memory card type:

Recording media: USB storage media Flash-Memory

Memory stick Micro ( up to 8 GB),  Memory stick Micro ( up to 16 GB), Memory stick Micro ( up to 32 GB)

Internal Memory 128 GB 

Interface:

Input/output connector micro USB
Bluetooth 4.2 CONNECTIVITY
802.11ac  WI-FI CONNECTIVITY
Diode

Package:

Color options: White, Blue, Black, Red, Orange, Yellow
USB cableAdhesive mount

Rechargeable battery pack

Size & Weight:

Dimensions (W X H X ) 2.85x2.85x1.14 in
Dimensions magnet (WхH) 0.7x0.7 in

Weight: 4.74 oz










What We Need 
We are determined to make this SelfieCam. But we still need a financial push to make the SelfieCam a reality. Our goal at this stage is to finish our prototype and to move SelfieCam into mass production. We have all the key elements and teams ready to go for this project and just need the proper funding to make it all happen. We're hoping that with your help we can make the SelfieCam a reality.


We need your support
Your help would allow our small team to grow in size. Every single donation matters and will let us pay for all remaining development, testing, manufacturing, quality control, packaging and shipping expenses. The final product would be released sooner and with the highest quality. We also have a vision to bring a SelfieCam store in all the major cities so everyone can get a chance to check out our products. Without your contribution, we simply won't be able to continue.
story_txt:
SELFIECAM.       
We would like to present you the most advanced
cam on the present day. It is the smallest and technically useful one.
Portable selfie
photo/video cam – Selfie Cam opens for the owners of the present device the
possibility to enjoy high-quality and colorful pictures in any place and at any
time.  
Thanks to its portability
no need more to choose for the right angle, light or position, in order to get
good photo or video. You will forget at once about the blurry photos, because
the cam will be fixed moveless on any surface! 

The Cam’ size allows you
to carry it wherever you wish, in  the trip, street, on a visit. 

And the built-in battery
will rescue you from searching of the  DC
power.  High-quality photos and video!Selfie Cam is equipped with 13 Mpx cam with
autofocus, which allows you to take photos and video in Full HD. Selfie Cam – is
the cam of new generation. The quality of photos and video is on a high level! It
is small-sized, simple and easy for application cam. It’s the best solution for
those ones who likes selfie.

Bright and colorful photos and videoSmart
3 LED flash located around the device Selfie Cam allows you to transmit the
light on the photo/video shooting, which ensures the high-quality pictures even
during the insufficient lighting.  





Stereo sound on video!Selfie Cam is equipped with the microphone
recording the sound in stereo format. Thanks to the HD sound technology you are
able to view video in the original sound. With the digital noise technology
which reduces the level of outside noises up to 98%
you are able to enjoy clear and quality sound. 

Easy selfie shooting!

Selfie Cam is equipped
with an integrated button with start-up timer – 5, 10 and 15 sec. 

Magnetic mounting.
Selfie
Cam is equipped with the magnet, which allows you to mount the cam on a metal
surface. 

And
thanks to the movable plate for magnet which is included in the set in the form
of suckers, you can always mount the Selfie Cam to any smooth surface. 

Mobile technologies
Selfie Cam built-in with
the modules of Bluetooth 4.2 and WiFi 802.11ac


The Bluetooth module can
be used for synchronizing with your smart phone in order to make selfie
shooting at the maximum distance of 10 meters.

Using the WI-FI module
you can view the received photos or video from the internal memory of  Selfie Cam without cable connection on your
smart phone with the app. 


Mount, connect, shoot!
All you need is – to
mount the Selfie Cam on the surface, to synchronize your mobile by Bluetooth or
Wi-Fi and click the button “shoot”.




Do you feel fear and worry to keep your child alone?

Use Selfie Cam and you
will be always aware what is he doing and what is happening around him. 
Access to the internet is all you need to monitor your baby from
anywhere and everywhere.
When you connect you get a wide view of your baby's room and the ability
to pan and tilt to have a look around. The Selfie Cam not
only allows you to see your baby remotely, it also offers advanced sound characteristics.
The Selfie Cam working
for your peace of mind.





Make your friends be
impressed!

Selfie Cam – is the
device capable to become the reliable home protection. It allows you do not
only see the person standing behind the door, but also to make the photo, and
video without leaving the room.   









Internal memory.

Selfie Cam is available
in three models with internal memory – 8 Gb, 16 Gb and 32 Gb.
The memory volume can be enlarged with the card slot microSD. 
The maximum supported memory microSD – 128 Gb. 




6 colors models!
We designed for your 6
colors solutions. 
For your choice: White,
Blue, Black, Red, Orange and Yellow colors.










SPECIFICATIONS
SENSOR:
Sensore TYPE - 1/2.5" type 
CMOS
The quantity of sensor - 1
Number OF PIXELS (EFFECTIVE) 13.0 MP
Movie:
Enjoy Full HD image recording
for extremely high-quality expression and minimal noise
Movie resolution 1920x1080/30 fps

Maximum frame rate
when shooting HD video: 120fps high – speed recording  at a resolution of 1280x720, 60 fps high –
speed  at a resolution of 1920x1080Audio:
Built-in stereo
microphone
Recording format
audio: stereo
Still image resolution:

Maximum still image resolution 4608x3456
Recording format : still images: JPEG compliant
Optical: 10x
Self-Timer ; 2 Sec, 10 Sec
Memory card type:Recording media:
USB storage media Flash-Memory
Memory stick Micro (
up to 8 GB),  Memory stick Micro ( up to
16 GB), Memory stick Micro ( up to 32 GB)
Internal Memory
128 GB 
Interface:

Input/output connector micro USB
Bluetooth 4.2 CONNECTIVITY
802.11ac  WI-FI CONNECTIVITY 
Diode
Package:

Color
options: White, Blue, Black, Red, Orange, Yellow
USB cableAdhesive
mount

Rechargeable battery packSize & Weight:



Dimensions (W X H X ) 2.85x2.85x1.14 in 
Dimensions magnet (WхH) 0.7x0.7 in

Weight: 4.74 oz



















What We Need We are determined to make this SelfieCam. But we still need a financial push to make the SelfieCam a reality. Our goal at this stage is to finish our prototype and to move SelfieCam into mass production. We have all the key elements and teams ready to go for this project and just need the proper funding to make it all happen. We're hoping that with your help we can make the SelfieCam a reality.

We need your support
Your help would allow our small team to grow in size. Every single donation matters and will let us pay for all remaining development, testing, manufacturing, quality control, packaging and shipping expenses. The final product would be released sooner and with the highest quality. We also have a vision to bring a SelfieCam store in all the major cities so everyone can get a chance to check out our products. Without your contribution, we simply won't be able to continue.

story:
SONICAM is perfect for professionals craving near real-time, high quality capturing of 3D video and sounds, while remaining affordable! SONICAM combines the latest in video production technology, intuitively accounting for 3D spatial sound, real-time video stitching, live streaming and auto noise reduction for a seamless image stitching experience! SONICAM is the all-in-one 360º camera made just for you!

Please click the pictures below to experience the 360 video samples recorded with SONICAM.

Click to view beautiful New Zealand in 4K , filmed outdoor in strong light.

 

Check out this indoor dance party we captured using SONICAM! Put on your headphones, swipe and immerse yourself in a 360° music experience.

 

Check out this Time-Lapse of a small town tour. 

 

 

Please click the picture below and put your earphones on and enjoy the 360 audio! Ensure that the right & left channels are correctly matched.

  

 

  

 

SONICAM is the perfect camera for any professional or hobbyist looking to record in 3D or for use in VR. Spherical videos can be used for business, fun and everything in between.

Using "SONICAM 3D Spatial Sounds", we have developed the ultimate tool to direct users attention. Sound is mapped in full 360º to the 3D video, enabling you to create sounds from any direction and draw the user's attention to where you want them to look. Spatial Audio is essential to VR as it creates a believable experience that matches with the users senses, immersing them into the world you have captured! Without it, unsynchronized visual and audio sensory inputs jades the VR experience.

The Science Behind The SONICAM 3D Spatial Sound

Real-time video stitching is done combining SONICAM’s proprietary algorithm, and using an FPGA. It's intuitive and really easy to use! 

Unlike traditional 360 cameras, we have a preview function. Now you can preview the images and videos while shooting and capture the perfect performance!

SONICAM supports H.265/H.264 encoding for RTMP and RTSP live streaming broadcast. 

With our professional 9 * Sony Exmor R & STARVIS CMOS Image Sensor, SONICAM excels at capturing images in low-light environments while maintaining high picture quality in visible-light.

 

ISO, White Balance, Shutter, Professional Gamma Setting, Brightness, Sharpness, Saturation, Contrast; play around and customize all this and more! We provide the RAW format of images, so you can create your own work of art. 

 We know that Time-Lapse is a must for professionals. Select different time intervals, put it in position and record awesome Time-Lapse videos for you to share.

 

With the SONICAM Player App, you can control everything with ease. Available on both iOS and Android, it allows you to remotely control and shoot with SONICAM. With Wi-Fi, you can

  • Shoot videos
  • Capture images
  • Preview footages
  • Play back from the gallery
  • Live streaming
 

 

 

 

  

 

SONICAM was founded with the goal to revolutionize the virtual reality industry by providing an affordable 360-degree and VR camera to professional consumers and hobbyists. SONICAM is built with the goal to push the boundaries of virtual reality industry.

Founded in April 2016 in Shenzhen, SONICAM was pioneered by founder & CTO, James Zhan, co-founders Danny Zhu & Xiaobin Liu, each with 20+ years work experience in multimedia development for top international companies. James Zhan has applied for more than 100 parents during his career with rich research and development experience at Huawei.

The team now is made up of 25 members, includes more than 20 engineers who specialize in software, hardware, FPGA, algorithm, and test engineering. 

 

Moving from our initial idea, we took time to make several prototypes to finalize the ultimate design and functions. It was not easy, but we did it!

 

 

   

SONICAM will become available online in late 2017, and in select stores at the same time. However, super early-bird backers of the KickStarter will have first access to SONICAM at a reduced price point of $1,999. In early 2018, SONICAM will retail for $3,999.

story:
My name is Christina Nijim, I am a 26 year old aspiring Palestinian Filmmaker.

I was born in a small city in the west bank called “Ramallah”. I was raised under war and occupation all life through, but living in such a dark reality helped me embrace the darkness in life but create my own light within. Photography was my outlet, and art was my surviving tool.

I have always dreamed of becoming a film maker, of entertaining people around the world with the most precious tool humans possess. The power of a film is infinite and timeless, but more importantly I want to reach out to human beings around the world who are going through hardships and unfair life circumstances, especially children paying the consequences of war and violence.

I want to put a smile on a face, to show people that no matter who you are , no matter where you come from, you can always dare to dream.

Always aspire to inspire.

This short film will portray the story of two Palestinian women who have a unique sense of humor and who survive in their harsh political reality by laughing, and by loving. This film will portray the power of a Palestinian woman, the uniqueness in how she handles hardships with an open mind but more importantly with an open heart. It is a simple story about finding beauty in the damage.

I chose to feature Palestinian talents, and Palestinian locations because I want to give integrity to the film but more importantly I want to give an opportunity for Palestinian talents to reach out and have an international platform where their voices can be heard. This will not only get me a step closer towards my dream, but it will carry on the dreams of other women and fresh talents who deserve a platform for their voices.

For the funding part, since I will be shooting in Palestine I will have limited supplies and connections. Due to the occupation and political restrictions there is no film industry in Palestine. There are no film companies or production companies that can fund and provide all the necessary tools for making a short film.

 I will need a budget around 6000 dollars to at least get decent camera equipment, light equipment, production design, crafts and catering services, and to pay for the cast and crew members.

I need human beings who believe in the power of talent and the value of dreaming, who believe in a better future for humanity where war and oppression can be fought with art. I need individuals and companies to put faith in my talent and voice and to help me reach my full potential. This film will be screened in Warner Brothers studios in Los Angeles and it will be the first Palestinian film to ever be screened there. If I can show people that Palestinians are full of life and love, if I can infatuate them with my characters, I believe I will get a step closer towards creating an artistic platform in Palestine.

Anyone who contributes in making this film come to life will be contributing in building a new platform for the Palestinian youth to help them survive and resist through art instead of violence. You will be saving lives by providing much needed outlets for people going through war and the consequences of occupation.

story:
Minimized weight, sophisticated design, adjustable compartment.

Momento was born to capture the golden moment: Direct side access to the camera, adjustable compartments to optimize storage capacity, and made of special materials to minimize weight.

 

 


 

 

“The Photographer’s camera backpack.”

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

“Life is heavy enough. 1.43kg only.”

 

All the unnecessities eliminated. Ultralight Momento focuses only on core function of a camera bag.

 

 

 

High quality material nylon carbonate applied: resistant to abrasion, nontoxic, and water-repellent.

 

High quality YKK zipper and Woojin plastic buckle applied to maximize utilization. 

 

 

 

“Don’t miss out the golden moment”

 

Don’t want to miss out the golden moment. Use the side access to reach the camera immediately.​

 

 

 

 

“Adjustable compartments for optimized storage”

 

11 velcro partitions available to freely adjust compartment.

 

 

 

 

“Extra-protection for your camera”

 

 

 

 

 

 

Double-protection for your camera from falling with a detachable mesh cover.

 

 


Lock up the safety key ring slider to keep your gear safe and sound. (Applied on front zipper and side access) ​

 

 

 

Slide in the dangling zipper to prevent it from damaging the camera.

 

 

 

Use the rain cover to keep your gear safe from rain. (Given out to all backers)

 

 

 

“Adjustable bands to fit your body perfectly”

 

Adjust the waist belt and chest belt fit to your body.
 

(The waist belt is detachable with velcro)

 

 

 

Use the adjustable side belt to carry tripods. 

 

 

 

Breathable air mesh protects your shoulder and waist from abrasion and reduces fatigue.

 

 

 

Use the stable top handle to hang the backpack.

 

 


Attach the backpack on the suitcase in case of long-distance travel.​

 

 

 

 

 

 

You may think since the bag is light, it won't be able to carry much. But in fact, it can carry even more than an average camera bag. We designed it to its full potential of maximum storage where no space is wasted to keep all your camera, tablet, memory card, chargers and other equipments in the bag.  

 

 

 

It can hold 16” Mabook
Laptop exceeding 36cmX25cm may not fit (inch size : 14.2” × 9.8”)

 

 

 

Store small items such as lens caps in the waist pocket.

 

 


Side pockets are useful to store frequently used items.

 

 

 

Sophisticated world map graphic at the front, with matt black finish.

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

 

In 2016 our team created a global outdoor travelling backpack and successfully funded approximately 500,000 dollars through crowdfunding.  

Now, we proudly present to you the ultralight camera backpack ‘Momento’ through Indiegogo. We have asked over 80 professional photographers regards to their problems and concerns while taking photos and travelling.

Momento has 3 unique features which other camera bags do not have.

To begin with, our product is made of non-toxic nylon-carbonate which makes the bag ultralight yet durable to any weather conditions. Next, the side access pocket lets you reach the camera in 3 seconds so that you don’t miss out the golden moment. And last and foremost, we eliminated all the unnecessities to keep the design functional, simple and classy, just the way you want it!

It took almost a year to develop the ultimate camera backpack which allows photographers to focus on photography without any disturbance.We are committed to shipping out the products during this time of the outbreak. Ambitionem promises the best for our backers while they capture the best.  

Thank You.

Team Ambitionem
