story:
About the Film and Cast...

Ice The Movie was imagined by professional figure skater, and actress Maddison Bullock. In addition to Bullock, the film stars several former professional figure skaters, hockey players, as well as current elite level sectional and regional champions. The authenticity of its cast makes Ice The Movie a truly one of a kind Ice Skating Feature Film. The cast also includes Emmy Nominee and star of the hit series '24', Gregory Itzen, Mike C. Manning, star of the Disney Chanel Original Movie 'Cloud 9', and Patrick O'Brien Demsey star of the Disney's 2004 Ice Hockey spectacular, 'Miracle'. 

 

What We Need... 

After a month on location in gorgeous Centennial and Winter Park, Colorado we are now 75% complete. This is in large part due to the generosity of the local businesses and skating clubs that facilitated our production needs with a level of enthusiasm and kindness we could never had anticipated. With their assistance we find ourselves now entering the final stages of filming and will be headed into post-production shortly thereafter! This is a very exciting time however we still have lots of work ahead and need your help! 

* In order to fairly pay our hard working cast and crew for pick-up shots in LA, as well as pay for proper equipment and locations we need approximately $2,000

*Afterwards, to make the movie sparkle for the big screen post-production will incur a considerable expense, for example:

Renting a professional quality sound studio (approx. $3,000)

Hiring a professional quality colorist to make every frame beautiful and conform our final file (approx. $5,000)

The Impact

Ice The Movie seeks to instill in young athletes, those both novice and senior, the priceless values of character, teamwork, and integrity both on and off the ice. Although the film's core messages can be of value to both boys and girls we believe it to be of particular influence to young women as the narrative's two powerful female leads express strength, determination, passion, and camaraderie in an another-wise cold, and hyper-individualistic  arena. 

Popularity and promise for the future...

Of the 25 most popular sports movies of all time 3 films that centered around the stories of strong female athletes made the list- Million Dollar Baby (14) A league of their own (21) Bend it like beckham (24). 2 of the other films on the list where hockey films slap shot (13) and the film that Ice’s writer was largely inspired by, Miracle (11) 

According to Business Insider Figure Skating was the most talked about Winter Olympic Sport during the first week of the Olympics in 2014 in the most number of Countries. With the 2018 Winter Olympics just around the corner, and Ice The Movie holds promise as not only a fan favorite, but it has the potential to become an iconic, sports classic. 

We thank you in advance for your consideration and support, happy skating! 

Sincerely, 

Maddison Bullock 

Ice The Movie 

EP|Writer

What We Need... 
After a month on location in gorgeous Centennial and Winter Park, Colorado we are now 75% complete. This is in large part due to the generosity of the local businesses and skating clubs that facilitated our production needs with a level of enthusiasm and kindness we could never had anticipated. With their assistance we find ourselves now entering the final stages of filming and will be headed into post-production shortly thereafter! This is a very exciting time however we still have lots of work ahead and need your help! 
* In order to fairly pay our hard working cast and crew for pick-up shots in LA, as well as pay for proper equipment and locations we need approximately $2,000
*Afterwards, to make the movie sparkle for the big screen post-production will incur a considerable expense, for example:
Renting a professional quality sound studio (approx. $3,000)
Hiring a professional quality colorist to make every frame beautiful and conform our final file (approx. $5,000)

The Impact
Ice The Movie seeks to instill in young athletes, those both novice and senior, the priceless values of character, teamwork, and integrity both on and off the ice. Although the film's core messages can be of value to both boys and girls we believe it to be of particular influence to young women as the narrative's two powerful female leads express strength, determination, passion, and camaraderie in an another-wise cold, and hyper-individualistic  arena. 
Popularity and promise for the future...
Of the 25 most popular sports movies of all time 3 films that centered around the stories of strong female athletes made the list- Million Dollar Baby (14) A league of their own (21) Bend it like beckham (24). 2 of the other films on the list where hockey films slap shot (13) and the film that Ice’s writer was largely inspired by, Miracle (11) 
According to Business Insider Figure Skating was the most talked about Winter Olympic Sport during the first week of the Olympics in 2014 in the most number of Countries. With the 2018 Winter Olympics just around the corner, and Ice The Movie holds promise as not only a fan favorite, but it has the potential to become an iconic, sports classic. 
We thank you in advance for your consideration and support, happy skating! 
Sincerely, 
Maddison Bullock 
Ice The Movie 
EP|Writer

story:
Meet Laibox Cam

The World's First Interchangeable Lens Action Camera

              

 

 

Interchangeable Lens

Interchangeable Lens give you inspiration to capture the moment you want , but the most of action cameras on the market only provide wide angle lens, you don't have any other options to take truly unique photos. This is the reason why our team created Laicam. It is the first action camera with interchangeable lens, you can switch lens for different occasions just like typical DSLR. But better than that, changing lens for Laibox Cam is as easy as sticking two Lego bricks. 

Featured On

 

Why Laibox Cam

Laibox Cam have the fish-eye camera with wide-angle lens camera with a range of up to 170°and 14 million piexls in high resolution. It could be support 4K pixel when take the video. After you change into the double SENSOR module, it will have a 8X optical zoom function. The picture do not have distortion when shot taken at close range. After you change into the panoramic lens module, it could be reach 720°shooting, angle with out any blind angle.

 

720° Full View

 

8X Optical Zoom

 

Flat Angle

 

170° Wide Angle Lens

 

Dual 13MP Lens

The first Lens Laibox Cam offers is Dual 13MP lens. Most wide angles lenses use software to cut the photo and  stretch it with algorithm. Photo quality is not so good as real in this way. Laibox Cam has Dual 13MP Lens to capture more light, more details and get greater depth of field.

Dual 13MP Lens is our first extra lens for Laibox Cam, the next ones will be 360° lens, VR lens etc. With your support Laibox Cam has unlimited possibility. Once you have a Laibox Cam camera, that menas you have a sports DV, optical zoom camera and 360° panoramic camera  at the same time.

 

Capture Your Movement In 4K

With  14mp  sensor and 7G lens, Laibox Cam can record 4K pictures and videos at 30 frames per second. The optical image stabilization (OIS) technology makes every movement crisper, clearer and more details.

 

7 Layers Glass Lens

7 Layers Glass lens provides more colors and details for your photo.

 

Long Lasting Battery 

You don't want to miss any precious moment  when the battery is dead. Laibox Cam uses  hot-swappable  battery, you  change battery while camera is working. Extra battery has 1100mAh capacity and lasts for more than 2  hours. Our battery  and battery case are also compatible with GoPro Hero 5.

 

180° Rotatable Screen

Get a better selfie with Laicam's 180° Rotatable Screen.

 

Stereo Mic For Immersive Sound

Record clear and real sound with Laicam's built-in stereo mic. We place the mic on the top of the camera to reduce wind noise and improve sound quality on voice recordings.

 

Easy Control

Laibox Cam is designed to operate with single hand.All buttons are in places where your thumb and forefinger  can reach easily . Thanks to the mini size and image stabilization technology, you can take high quality picture just with one hand.

 

Remote Control 

You can control Laicam via our APP to monitor the scene and take picture / video. 

 

See It In Action

 

 

A Closer Look At Laicam

 

 

Timeline

Frequently Asked Questions

Q:How long does battery last?  

A:Laicam can last 2 hours to shoot 4K video at 30fps. 

 

Q:How to expand pixel of optical zoom module ?  

A:Please use two 13MP SONY sensors.

 

Q:How to switch for interchangeable lens module?  

A:Slide the button next to the lens module.

 

Q:What’s the size of display screen?    

 A:2- inch HD display screen.

 

Q:Does Laicam support touch screen?  

 A:The function is not available right now.

story:
About me

My name is Benjamin Zank. I'm 21 years old and a recent graduate from SUNY Purchase with a major in journalism. My hobbies include photography, photography, and photography.

On my last day of college, I dropped my Canon 5D Mark II into a swamp while on a routine shoot in the woods for my 365 project. My dinky little tripod just wasn't enough to balance it out, and by some stroke of horrible luck my camera will just not take a picture and the autofocus on my lens is unresponsive.

This is an opportunity for YOU to get quality prints of images that I've spent hours on and have even risked my safety, and at the same time provide me with the right equipment that will allow me to continue my 365 project and beyond, enabling me to create even more mind-blowing photographs.

How your contributions will be spent!

I've set a goal of $4000. Reaching this goal will allow me to purchase a new 5D Mark II ($1500~$1700), a weather resistant, high quality 50 mm 1.2 L lens ($1450), and a super sturdy tripod (~$300). that leaves me with roughly $550 for printing and shipping expenses.

Perks!

$10~$175 Prints, prints, prints! You will be getting prints from freshly shot concept with my new camera of sizes as large as 16x20!

$350 I will interpret your dreams/ideas through a photograph and feature it in my 365. You will receive creative credit for the image, and last but certainly not least: I will send you a signed and dated 16X20 or 20X20 print of the image. IT WILL NEVER BE PRINTED OR SOLD TO ANYONE ELSE. EVER. This is a personal collaboration between you and me.

$500 I will visit you anywhere in New York City for a portrait shoot. You will be featured in my 365 project. You will receive a 20x24 signed and dated print of one of the images taken.

$750 I will meet you anywhere in New York City for an all day hands on workshop and together we will create and edit YOUR photos. I will teach you everything I know from lighting to Photoshop techniques. I'll also take you to my favorite Chinese restaurant for noodle soup.

 *please add $10 for international shipping and handling for prints larger than 8x10*

 

If I don't reach my goal...

I know I've set an ambitious goal, but every bit still counts. If I can raise even just $1000, I will be very close to being able to afford another camera, just no lens or tripod.

 

Either way, I want to thank all of you for supporting me and taking the time to look at my work. It really means the world to me!

story:
New Information

A fundraiser is to be held in order to raise funds for Terryis.  Please see the link below:

https://www.facebook.com/events/1454828638100158/


The Proposal

Terryis Hamilton attended North West Fan Fest (a Fest that's held for cosplay lovers, gamers and geeks alike) the weekend of 27-29 Jun 2014.  While at the Fest he inspired cosplayers by taking their pictures and sharing his amazing personality with everyone.  Unfortunately, the day after the convention had ended, someone had broken into his residence and stole his camera.  For a photographer a camera is their baby and he is in great heartache right now.

He takes great photographs of Cosplayers like the great Spartans seen above as well as the images attached!

Our Goal

 

We would like to raise enough money to buy Terryis back his camera and accessories that were stolen.

A Canon 70D with Sigma 18-35mm 1.8 attached, as well as a Speedlite 430 Ex II.

The Impact

 

By you donating towards this cause you will bring great joy not only to Terryis, but the cosplay community as well.  Having photographers like Terryis in the community is what cosplay is all about.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot make a monetary donation, perhaps you know someone who can.  Please share this with as many people as you can.  Someone may be able to donate a camera to Terryis.  Any help is greatly appreciated.

Thank you for your time,

Argent

http://www.facebook.com/argentcosplay

story:
Use it to keep your cards organised at home and in the office or to keep them safe whilst on the move.

Cardpackr uses a system of 4 magnets inserted into each layer. These give just the right amount of grip to stop the layers accidentally coming apart whilst at the same time making it simple to separate them to access the cards.

We trialled numerous strengths, sizes and quantity of magnets as well as the positioning to get it just right and we think you’re going to love how it works.

Add as many layers as you want, there's no limit to how many you can stack together.

It’s the most versatile system ever developed.

Do magnets harm SD & sim cards?

Short simple answer = NO

SD & Sim cards are solid state with no moving parts and so are immune to magnetic field damage.

"There's nothing magnetic in flash memory, so a magnet won't do anything," - Bill Frank, executive director of CompactFlash.

Each layer comes with all 4 insert types.

You decide which combination of inserts suits you best and change them when required.

The inserts come with double sided tape already applied to the underside so you can just peel off the backing and stick it into your chosen layer.

After months of sketches, prototypes, testing, refining, re-prototyping and re-testing we finally found a solution that works better than we’d ever hoped and we can’t wait to get in into your hands.

Development Samples

 

Layer material: ABS Plastic

Magnets: 4 x Neodymium per layer

Inserts: EVA rubber

W2 is a small design partnership with offices in the UK and China. Between us we have successfully bought over 100 products to market over the last 15 years. We are experienced in every stage of the process including initial concepts, 3D designs, prototyping, testing, manufacturing and fulfilment.

We don’t have large marketing or social media advertising budgets, we’re just passionate about what we do and need the help of an active crowdfunding community to bring our designs to life.

story:
Need someone to film ?





FOR DIRECT PRE-ORDERS VISIT:

WWW.PERSONALCAMERAMAN.COM or WWW.MOVENSEE.COM


HURRY UP FOR THE SPECIAL

PRE-ORDER SPECIAL PRICE!















NOTE : For nautical sports (kite-surfing, windsurfing, surfing, wake-boarding…) Pixio will not be adapted due to insufficient range. Therefore we do recommend to use Move ‘N See Classic or E-FullMotion models.






If you want more than just switching on and filming, you can!
The REMOTE CONTROL APP is designed for Android and iOS smart-phones and tablets.
For example, you can switch off the auto-follow mode. You control yourself the rotations, zoom level, and REC.
Or you can set-up a timelapse sequence!
As a sport coach, keep the auto-follow mode and decide who is filmed, and when: 

Switch-on PIXIO, assign names to the TAGs, and just press "Doug" if you want Doug to be filmed, and press "Mary" when you want Mary to be filmed. You can concentrate on your coaching, PIXIO is filming!
You don't want this APP because you just want a plug&play PIXIO ? Just switch on your PIXIO and you are tracked and filmed!





GET MORE FEATURES ! additional functions available (REC control from the watch and Automatic zoom) when using one of the following camcorders:

SONY HDR CX130 and PJ130, HDR CX160, HDR CX220 and PJ220, HDR CX240 and PJ240, HDR CX250 and PJ250, HDR CX260 and PJ260, HDR CX320 and PJ320, HDR CX330 and PJ330, HDR CX405, HDR CX410 and PJ410, HDR CX420 and PJ420, HDR CX430 and PJ430, HDR XR500, HDR CX505, HDR CX530 and PJ530, HDR CX560 and PJ560, HDR CX570, HDR PJ620, HDR CX700 and PJ700, HDR CX740 and PJ740, HDR CX760 and PJ760, HDR CX780 and PJ780, HDR CX790 and PJ790, HDR CX810 and PJ810, HDR CX820 and PJ820, HDR CX900, FDR AX100. This list will be regularly updated.



WARRANTY
Coming with your PIXIO: 2 years legal warranty after delivery

WORLDWIDE DELIVERY

THE TEAM!

CONTACT US FOR ANY QUESTION, WE NEVER SLEEP

story:
A few words about our product

 the camera:


This camera is like having a third eye, which allows you the control and the knowledge of the special times, the expected and unexpected times, the magical times, and all the little surprises on the way which make life so meaningful.





This product was developed and designed for over a year with great care for the smallest of detail. We are asking for your support for our fabulous product. I believe that everyone deserves the possibility of controlling whatever he wants to see.




Do you want to see???




Do you want to control the knowledge??
Do you want to enjoy the special and magical moments even when you can't be there in person???

Do you want to feel safe??



You can have all this at this great price and only on indiegogo!!!

All this will be in your favor, by helping us fulfill our dream!








What is camNgo?


The camera is a small device that you can put anywhere and it gives you the exact picture of what is happening in the place that we would like to be. Making us a part of what is going on even without anyone knowing that we are there.

The camera has a very simple and user friendly program activation, the design is exceptional and sharing the application and the movie are simple.



While the camera is working you are able to

take still photos in order to save a moment forever, those special important moments. With a click on your smart phone you can save it directly to you phone's memory.


perks for our Indiegogo contributors:

story:
This is LUMI ELFI, the next-gen selfie grip that combines the convenience of a smartphone camera with the versatility of a DSLR. Make any mobile picture and video look professional by slapping on LUMI ELFI. 

No more lugging around heavy camera equipment or spending thousands on other devices with redundant features. Just you, your phone, and LUMI ELFI are all you're going to need to make that next viral content!

 

The Auto Face Tracking feature detects your face and motion so that the camera smoothly follows you when you move out of frame. Instead of limiting your range of motion to fit in the small mobile screen, LUMI ELFI gives you the freedom to capture movement with no interruptions to your natural flow.

This feature comes especially in handy when you want to film or shoot vertically. Vertical videos have become the new standard on major social media platforms like Instagram and Tik Tok, so using LUMI ELFI unlocks endless possibilities to shooting in that vertical frame.

Whether you want to live-stream a cool recipe in the kitchen, make a travel vlog, or finally film that new TikTok dance you've been practicing, this feature provides unparalleled convenience for any independent creative.

 

Panoramas become much easier to shoot with LUMI ELFI. Its built-in tilt meter guides you to find the optimal angle to take a seamless 360° of your surrounding. When the meter reads green, all you do is press the Panorama icon button and let LUMI work its magic. No weird stretches, glitches, merges and curves - just a clean, crisp shot of the view around you.

 

Thanks to LUMI ELFI's premium panoramic technology, you can even experiment with cloning illusions! The difference in quality truly shows when you try to get creative.

 

The Auto Motion Timelapse feature gives you ultimate satisfaction in capturing the best sunset, cityscape, or any other breathtaking view. It offers various speed options (4x, 8x, 12x, 20x, 40x), giving you more control to create your desired shot, and enough power to film up to an hour's worth of footage. 

LUMI ELFI's structured build also allows you to use it as a sturdy mount. Place it on a flat, even surface and you'll find your shot looking like you used a DSLR and a tripod. Quality results without the hassle.

LUMI ELFI's built-in control panel allows you to adjust the camera angle and zoom functions, the option to capture a picture or video, and whether to shoot from your front or back camera - all conveniently in one hand. 

Unlike most regular selfie sticks that make you retract your arm to fix the camera and then extend back to capture, LUMI ELFI lets you adjust everything with intuitively-placed buttons. So it's like you get the full control of a DSLR but on an easy-to-use mobile camera. 

This design went through multiple prototypes to satisfy that feeling of fitting perfectly in your hand. Not too big, not too small - just the right, substantial size. The control panel's buttons are then all located within a single thumb's reach, giving you comfortable access to all of LUMI ELFI's wondrous features.

When most selfie sticks are not stable enough to guarantee your phone's safety while out and about in dynamic situations, LUMI ELFI's silicone-covered clips put your anxiety to rest. They keep your camera securely locked and rolling even in the most energetic photographer's hands.

 

LUMI ELFI can extend up to 14 in. (360mm), but it is also compact and light enough to keep in your back pocket, fanny pack, or backpack when contracted. It is your trusty travel buddy and high-grade camera tool to whip out whenever and wherever.

 

 
 

Simply download the LUMI ELFI app, available for both iOS and Android, and pair LUMI via Bluetooth to have all features and more available in seconds. A quick tap into the app gives you access to several shooting modes as well as an editing suite that lets you fine-tune your content to your taste.

Plus, instant wireless connection means you can do all that without draining any battery from your actual phone. LUMI ELFI lets you save your battery life for what's actually important.

In the package you receive, you'll see LUMI ELFI itself, a micro USB cable to charge the device, and a user manual that provides an in-depth explanation of LUMI ELFI's many capabilities and features. 

LUMI ELFI comes in two colors: Clear White and Bold Black. Either neutral tone easily coordinates with any outfit and occasion. Just choose your personal preference!

 A worldwide operation with offices in Hong Kong and China, Kinofi is staffed by an international group of experts, dreamers, and gadget lovers.

Our desire to fuel creativity pushes us to be creative ourselves. With your help and backing, the brand new technology employed in the Kinofimount will be just the first of our dreams to come true. Our team is hard at work developing more innovative audio-visual solutions for the future.

Born from the question, “Why is my phone so smart and my selfie stick so stupid?”, the founders realized that there had to be a smarter and more affordable way to take great pictures and create engaging content.

Our innovative design and technology has been built upon years of investment, time and energy. We have gained popular recognition in the manufacturing field of mobile phones and cameras in Asia and have been acknowledged with multiple awards such as Hong Kong ICT Award and POLYU Tech Launchpad Fund Award.

To protect our proprietary innovations and inventions, we currently own 45 patents for our unique design and advanced technology, so you can be sure that our LUMI ELFI will be the most unique, advanced, and cutting-edge device for you and your photography needs.
story_txt:
This is LUMI ELFI, the next-gen selfie grip that combines the convenience of a smartphone camera with the versatility of a DSLR. Make any mobile picture and video look professional by slapping on LUMI ELFI. 
No more lugging around heavy camera equipment or spending thousands on other devices with redundant features. Just you, your phone, and LUMI ELFI are all you're going to need to make that next viral content!





 

 
 The Auto Face Tracking feature detects your face and motion so that the camera smoothly follows you when you move out of frame. Instead of limiting your range of motion to fit in the small mobile screen, LUMI ELFI gives you the freedom to capture movement with no interruptions to your natural flow.
This feature comes especially in handy when you want to film or shoot vertically. Vertical videos have become the new standard on major social media platforms like Instagram and Tik Tok, so using LUMI ELFI unlocks endless possibilities to shooting in that vertical frame.
Whether you want to live-stream a cool recipe in the kitchen, make a travel vlog, or finally film that new TikTok dance you've been practicing, this feature provides unparalleled convenience for any independent creative.




 
 
Panoramas become much easier to shoot with LUMI ELFI. Its built-in tilt meter guides you to find the optimal angle to take a seamless 360° of your surrounding. When the meter reads green, all you do is press the Panorama icon button and let LUMI work its magic. No weird stretches, glitches, merges and curves - just a clean, crisp shot of the view around you.
 

 

 
Thanks to LUMI ELFI's premium panoramic technology, you can even experiment with cloning illusions! The difference in quality truly shows when you try to get creative.
 

 




 

 

 

 

 
The Auto Motion Timelapse feature gives you ultimate satisfaction in capturing the best sunset, cityscape, or any other breathtaking view. It offers various speed options (4x, 8x, 12x, 20x, 40x), giving you more control to create your desired shot, and enough power to film up to an hour's worth of footage. 
LUMI ELFI's structured build also allows you to use it as a sturdy mount. Place it on a flat, even surface and you'll find your shot looking like you used a DSLR and a tripod. Quality results without the hassle.




 


 


 


 
LUMI ELFI's built-in control panel allows you to adjust the camera angle and zoom functions, the option to capture a picture or video, and whether to shoot from your front or back camera - all conveniently in one hand. 
Unlike most regular selfie sticks that make you retract your arm to fix the camera and then extend back to capture, LUMI ELFI lets you adjust everything with intuitively-placed buttons. So it's like you get the full control of a DSLR but on an easy-to-use mobile camera. 



 
This design went through multiple prototypes to satisfy that feeling of fitting perfectly in your hand. Not too big, not too small - just the right, substantial size. The control panel's buttons are then all located within a single thumb's reach, giving you comfortable access to all of LUMI ELFI's wondrous features.

 

 
When most selfie sticks are not stable enough to guarantee your phone's safety while out and about in dynamic situations, LUMI ELFI's silicone-covered clips put your anxiety to rest. They keep your camera securely locked and rolling even in the most energetic photographer's hands.
 

 

 
LUMI ELFI can extend up to 14 in. (360mm), but it is also compact and light enough to keep in your back pocket, fanny pack, or backpack when contracted. It is your trusty travel buddy and high-grade camera tool to whip out whenever and wherever.
 
Add on the Lumi Tripod for extra stability! More details below.

 


 

 
 
Simply download the LUMI ELFI app, available for both iOS and Android, and pair LUMI via Bluetooth to have all features and more available in seconds. A quick tap into the app gives you access to several shooting modes as well as an editing suite that lets you fine-tune your content to your taste.
Plus, instant wireless connection means you can do all that without draining any battery from your actual phone. LUMI ELFI lets you save your battery life for what's actually important.

 
 


All pictures taken with LUMI ELFI.







 
In the package you receive, you'll see LUMI ELFI itself, a micro USB cable to charge the device, and a user manual that provides an in-depth explanation of LUMI ELFI's many capabilities and features. 



 
LUMI ELFI comes in two colors: Clear White and Bold Black. Either neutral tone easily coordinates with any outfit and occasion. Just choose your personal preference!

 


 

 


 A worldwide operation with offices in Hong Kong and China, Kinofi is staffed by an international group of experts, dreamers, and gadget lovers.
Our desire to fuel creativity pushes us to be creative ourselves. With your help and backing, the brand new technology employed in the Kinofimount will be just the first of our dreams to come true. Our team is hard at work developing more innovative audio-visual solutions for the future.
Born from the question, “Why is my phone so smart and my selfie stick so stupid?”, the founders realized that there had to be a smarter and more affordable way to take great pictures and create engaging content.
Our innovative design and technology has been built upon years of investment, time and energy. We have gained popular recognition in the manufacturing field of mobile phones and cameras in Asia and have been acknowledged with multiple awards such as Hong Kong ICT Award and POLYU Tech Launchpad Fund Award.
To protect our proprietary innovations and inventions, we currently own 45 patents for our unique design and advanced technology, so you can be sure that our LUMI ELFI will be the most unique, advanced, and cutting-edge device for you and your photography needs.
 


 
 

 Altos Business Group is a product launch consulting agency located in Costa Mesa, California and specializes in helping global tech startups launch their products in the United States.

story:
Statement：

In regard to the price, we misestimated the cost of production in crowdfunding. A good reputation is important for us and we still sent Gladius to our backers even though we lost a lot of money. After the Indiegogo campaign, we start to sell it at a right price $2199.
And now we gave Marketplace the lowest price,  1599 usd（Free Shipping）, which is lower than the market price.

Here is Marketplace link：https://www.indiegogo.com/products/gladius-underwater-photography-exploration-drone

 

 

 

Order yours now to ensure June delivery...just in time for summer.

Gladius Underwater Photography & Exploration Drone

World's most affordable & user-friendly underwater drone that's designed for everyone.

 

With easy to operate piloting controls, low-light sensors and image quality algorithms, Gladius empowers anyone to explore while capturing crystal clear, distortion free imagery at depths of 100 meters.

  

 

Whether you're a scuba diver, underwater photographer, commercial diver, oceanographer or just want to have fun, we've intelligently engineered Gladius with features to fit a wide range of uses:

  • Most Affordable - Compared to other underwater drones with similar features, Gladius is a steal at $599.
  • Easy To Control - Piloting is easy with its quad thrusters, four degrees of freedom and gaming-like controller.
  • Long Range - Semi-tether connection increases range to 500m and 100m deep, triple the industry average.
  • Image Optimization - Light sensors and image optimization algorithms create stunning 4K videos without distortion.
  • Portable Case - Weighing only 6.6lbs and measuring 16.9"x10.2"x3.7", transport anywhere via backpack or Gladius' hard-shell case available in the Professional perk.

 

 

Design, Camera & Piloting Overview

Gladius is an all-in-one underwater robotics package, complete with it's own hardshell travel case available in the Pro Perk.

 

 

Engineered with features for professional use, yet designed to be easy and fun for underwater photography enthusiast:

 

With Gladius you'll spend more time underwater, less time learning to use and you won't spend thousands to get a drone with comparable features.

 

   CLICK BELOW TO GET GLADIUS IN TIME FOR SUMMER   

Get Standard - $599  |  Get Advanced - $799  |  Get Premium - $1,025

 

 

What The Experts Are Saying

Recent press and media features on Gladius from first person reviews.

"I’ve looked at a prototype and it’s quite handsome. This beast is controlled via phone-connected remote and is semi-tethered, meaning it can roll out about 500 meters" -- TECHCRUNCH

 

"The first ever consumer market UUV (Unmanned Underwater Vehicle) to be able to do this and it deliver some pretty robust specs for its task" -- 4K.com

 

"Fish, treasure chests, sunken ships and whatnot are recorded at 1080p/60fps on the Standard, or 4K/30fps on the Advanced (built-in 1,200-lumen LED spotlights)" -- NEW ATLAS

 

 

 

Submersible Piloting Made Easy

Nimble submarine design and responsive gaming-controller allow you to get the most out its 4K camera.

With Gladius you'll spend more time underwater, less time learning to use and you won't spend thousands to get a drone with comparable features.

 

Omni-Directional Underwater Movement

Gladius' unique quad thruster design allows responsive and accurate navigation in all directions.

 

 

The quad-thruster design lets the drone move nimbly with four degrees of freedom:

  • left/right
  • forward/back
  • rise/fall
  • roll

 

The powerful rear thrusters will have Gladius zooming through the water (forwards or backwards) at speeds of 2 meters or 6.6 feet per second or at 4 knots.

 

 

Video Game-like Simple Controls

Simply insert your iOS or Android smartphone into the remote control.

With similarities to a gaming system, you move Gladius through the operation of two joysticks.

One operates the forward, back, and turning of the drone (think of it like walking), while the other operates the direction in which the camera faces (think of it like moving your head).

 

Your smartphone rests in the center of the remote controller, so you can view the live stream of your underwater exploration.

 

 

Piloting Depth, Range & Time Submersed

The Gladius underwater drone is capable of diving up to 100 meters (328ft) deep with a horizontal range of 500 meters (1640ft), while staying submerged for 3 hours.

The internal cabin of Gladius is sealed and uses aluminum alloy materials with oxidation treatment to ensure the drone is waterproof and corrosion resistant, allowing it to safely dive to 100 meters or 328 feet with ease.

Our unique semi-tether connection system increases the practical range of Gladius up to 500m or just over 1,600 feet. As radio waves don't travel well in water, this tether allows the drone to communicate with the towable buoy by direct wiring.

The tether connects to a towable, floating buoy which wireless connects to your smartphone remote control via long range Wifi communication. The buoy has an integrated wireless module with a range of up to 30m (98ft) for the Standard model and an impressive 500m (1,640ft) for the Advanced model.

Finally, Gladius' Polymer Lithium batteries have a run time of 3.5 hours while only requiring 1.5 hours of recharge time. 

 

   CLICK BELOW TO GET GLADIUS IN TIME FOR SUMMER   

Get Standard - $599  |  Get Advanced - $799  |  Get Premium - $1,025

 

Stunning Underwater Photography & Videography Made Easy

Capture high quality photo and video directly to internal storage or live stream your dive in real-time.

The Gladius underwater smart drone allows you to explore the depths with crystal clear HD imagery, conduct search and rescue operations from afar, and inspect boats, pools, and equipment without a diver handy.

 

Ultra HD, High Resolution HD Camera

Gladius features an on-board 1080P (Standard) or 4K (Advanced) camera in order to take stunning underwater photo and video.

See the underwater world like never before... (Footage is compress but be sure that Gladius shoots in Ultra HD)

The unique stabilizing mechanisms are combined with low light sensors and image quality optimization algorithm to allow users to take 16 megapixel photos and 4K video without distortion.

 

 

Adjustable Dimming LED Headlights

LED lights on either side of the camera have 135 degree illumination angle to light a clear path for the drone and illuminate your underwater subjects.

Each light is 1200 lumens and features dimming controls for varying visibility conditions.

Moreover, the lights can be continuously dimming for different conditions by push the buttons on the top-side of controller.

 

 

Live Stream and/or Store Internally

By using the Gladius iOS or Android smartphone app you get to choose which ones you want to save directly to your phone.

Live stream your underwater journey directly to your smartphone in 720P for easy navigation, photo, and video framing. All data and images are live transmission bidirectional.

Gladius also stores the videos and images you take on the included SD card. The Standard drone comes with a 16GB Micro SD storage card, and the Advanced package comes with a 64GB Micro SD storage card.

 

   CLICK BELOW TO GET GLADIUS IN TIME FOR SUMMER   

Get Standard - $599  |  Get Advanced - $799  |  Get Premium - $1,025

 

Intelligently Engineered Submarine By Design

Designed as a multi-use underwater robotics platform with affordability, functionality, ease of use and software in mind.

Gladius is engineered to be smart and easy, from the tethering connection, to buoy system, to buoyance, to the smartphone app and controls.

 

Neutral Buoyancy & Software Supported Stability

Neutral buoyancy means that the body of the drone has a density equal to that of the water in which it is immersed, so the drone doesn't float or sink.

The structure of Gladius was specially designed for neutral buoyancy in the water. Combined with our unique PID software algorithm, this ensures that the drone maintains stability while you're shooting video and photo.

This means Gladius will always stay suspended in place so you can precisely inspect an object at any depth.

 

 

Semi-Tether Communication System

The Gladius use unique semi-tether connection system, which extremely increase the practical range of vehicle up to 500 meters.

The data and image connection system contains two parts: tether and buoy.

The tether connects to a towable, floating buoy which wirelessly connects to your smartphone remote control via long range Wifi communication.

Gladius uses a neutrally buoyant tether to communicate to a towable buoy on the surface, as radio waves don't travel well in water and particularly at the depths this submarine can dive to. The buoy has an integrated wireless module with a range of up to 30m (98ft) for the Standard model and an impressive 500m (1,640ft) for the Advanced model.

All data and image from Gladius are live bidirectional transmissions, so you can watch live 720P HD video feedback (saves at up to 4k on SD card) or control Gladius using a tabled or laptop from a boat or from the shore.

In addition to extending range, we see the tether as a huge benefit...if anything happens to your drone at a deep depth, you can simply pull it up by the tether so you don’t lose your underwater drone investment.

 

 

Durable Travel Carrying Case 

Gladius was designed for portability and can easily fit into most backpacks but travels best in its hard-shell case.

The Gladius Underwater Drone Professional package comes with a hard-shell carrying case that protects your drone, tether, buoy and controller while in transit.

 

   CLICK BELOW TO GET GLADIUS IN TIME FOR SUMMER   

Get Standard - $599  |  Get Advanced - $799  |  Get Premium - $1,025

 

Gladius Drone Models, Tech Specs, Meet The Team & Production Timeline

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

What is Gladius? 

  • The Gladius is a smart underwater drone built for filming, observing, and exploring. It is a portable and user friendly device that is able to dive up to 100 meters depth and take high quality 16 Mega pixels photos & 4K videos in full HD.

Who created Gladius? 

  • Chasing-Innovation Technology Co. Ltd

Why should I use Gladius? 

  • At an affordable price, the Gladius allows you to enjoy the filming and exploring in 100 meters depth underwater. Whether you are diving, fishing, island hopping or exploring, the GLADIUS is an excellent tool for you.

What are the differences between Gladius Standard and Advanced? 

  • There’re several different features as follows: Camera: 4K for Advanced, 1080P for Standard; Horizontal Operation Range: 500 meters for Advanced, 30 meters for Standard; SD card capacity: 32G for Advanced, 8G for Standard.

How deep can the Gladius dive? 

  • For both the Standard and Advanced models, Gladius can dive up to 100 meters / 328 feet.

Why does Gladius use wired connection? 

  • Radio waves don't travel well through water (especially at deeper depths). Thus, the semi-tether system that we have created. The drone is connected by a tether to the a Wifi enabled buoy. You connect to the buoy via the smartphone remote controller. We have optimized the tether’s weight and diameter to make it easy to carry and use, but not impeding on user experience. Moreover, we see the tether as a huge benefit. If anything happens to your drone during a deep dive, you can simply pull it up by the tether so you don’t lose your investment.

Where’s the location of battery, and how long will it last? 

  • Unlike other drones which need external power or battery, Gladius comes with onboard LIPO smart batteries on the either side, providing a run time of over 3 hours.

The maximum tether length is 100 meters, so how could Gladius achieve 500 meters operation range? 

  • Unlike the traditional ROV, the horizontal range can be independent of the tether length. Gladius uses a neutrally buoyant tether to communicate to a towable buoy on the surface and the buoy connects to the pilot using a long range WiFi communication. The floating buoy has an integrate a wireless module with up to 500 meters wireless range (only in Advanced Edition). Even if you use the 30 meter tether, you still have a 500 meters horizontal operating range.

How to charge the Gladius? 

  • It’s very easy. The charging port is on the backend of the drone. Just open it and connect to the charger. One full charge takes around 90 minutes.

How to use the Gladius? 

  • We use controller and smartphones to control the Gladius. The controller is used for controlling the movement, and the smartphone (with app) is used for shooting, watching and setting. Both are easy to set up and have a friendly UI.

How do I know when the Gladius is running out of power? 

  • You can monitor the live information of batteries on the app. When the battery life reaches 20%, the APP will display a Low Battery warning. You can guide the Gladius back to you or pull the cable if the battery dies. The cable can resist a 50kg pull force so you do not need to worry about breaking anything.

When will shipping start? 

  • The first batch will begin shipping in June 2017.

Where does Gladius ship to? 

  • The Gladius is available for shipping worldwide!

How much is shipping? 

  • Shipping is FREE to US, Canada and China. $60 to EU, UK, Australia, & Japan. $99 to Rest of world

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT? 

  • Prices do not include importation taxes, duties or VAT. The backer is responsible for them. Please check your country's import duties before purchasing.

Is there a warranty with Gladius? 

  • We provide a one year limited warranty for manufacturing defects. Free repairs and component replacements will be provided under the warranty period for manufacturing defects. It won’t cover the misuse of the product, human factors, surface damages bumps or scratches.

 Where can I repair my Gladius? 

  • We will list repair stations on our website for your convenience. 

If I have other questions, who should I contact? 

  • Please reach out to service@chasing-innovation.com

If I'm interested in a distribution partnership who should I contact? 

  • Please direct distribution questions to sales@chasing-innovation.com.

 

 

 

Designed & Managed by Agency 2.0 - The #1  Crowdfunding Marketing Agency

At Agency 2.0, our commitment is to the backers by vetting every crowdfunding campaign we work with to ensure the quality product designs, fulfillment practices and the team behind the campaign.

When backing an Agency 2.0 crowdfunding campaign, you can rest assured we did our homework so you do not have to knowing Agency 2.0 crowdfunding campaigns:

  • Fulfillment rates far exceed the industry average in on-time delivery
  • Agency 2.0 has touched every product in advance of coming on board
